#==============================================================================
Map ID: 001
Map Name: Temperate Ocean
Tileset: 001: Outside
Width: 50, Height: 50
Auto-Change BGM: Ship

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (016,031)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: You find a Dank looking mushroom inside the pot.
@>Text: Eat it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Once you eat it, you will be locked into a Temple that 
  :    : is much like an extremely hard Gym.
 @>Text: You will not be able to leave the area without beating 
  :    : it, or losing.
 @>Text: Continue?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbCaveEntrance
  @>Script: Achievements.incrementProgress("TRIP",1)
  @>Text: You eat the mushroom, and feel REAL funny.
  @>Text: You black out.
  @>Transfer Player:[043: Route 1], (009,041), Up
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0215: ForestCamp is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: There seems to be a hole underneath the Pot. Move it 
 :    : and climb down?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Transfer Player:[212: MAP212], (024,022)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : will lend you some of its power.

(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]

  :    : point.

 @>Script: Achievements.incrementProgress("STATUES",1)
 @>Control Variables: [0080: StatuesTP] += 1
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON

 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (010,009)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: fk014

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Switches: [0140: SCALING] = ON
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] It was awful nice of you to come on this 
 :    : trip with me, \PN.
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] I promise you will like the Johto region, it 
 :    : is quite 
 :    : beautiful.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] Perhaps your journey there will be more 
 :    : interesting than the one in Galar, eh?
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] There was something I wanted to give 
 :    : you before 
 :    : we left port, but I forgot.
@>Text: He took out an Egg, and presented it. 
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] This contains a rare Pokemon that will 
 :    : help you on 
 :    : your adventure. I hope it helps you.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGenerateEgg(:SHAYMIN)
 @>Text: \xn[Old Man] It hear it's all the way from Sinnoh.
 @>Script: egg = $Trainer.last_party
 :       : egg.pbLearnMove(:SYNTHESIS)
 :       : egg.pbLearnMove(:AROMATHERAPY)
 :       : egg.happiness=200
 :       : egg.shiny = true
 :       : egg.obtain_text=_I("Your Boss")
 :       : egg.calc_stats
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Old Man] How do you have no room for the Egg?
 @>
: Branch End
@>Call Save Screen
@>Text: \xn[Old Man] Either way-
@>Text: \xn[Blue] Out of the way, looking for trainers!
@>Play BGM: 'Gary2', 100, 100
@>Set Move Route: [Blue]
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Graphic: "trchar071', 0, 4, 0
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \xn[Blue] You look like you are good enough.
@>Text: \xn[Blue] You wanna battle?
@>Fade Out BGM: 10 sec.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Well, let's get to it!
 @>Control Switches: [0139: Blue] = ON
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Well, okay then.
 @>Set Move Route: [Blue]
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Graphic: (None)
 @>Text: \xn[Old Man] I really cannot understand obsessive 
  :    : battlers like that.
 @>Text: \xn[Old Man] I am gonna head inside, gonna be in the 
  :    : cafeteria.
 @>Set Move Route: [EV001]
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: Blue
(X,Y): (018,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar071

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:GARYOAK)
@>Script: Kernel.pbNoticePlayer(get_character(0))
@>Script: Achievements.incrementProgress("GARY",1)
@>Script: setBattleRule("battle-worm")
@>Script: BattleWorm.random_all
@>Text: \xn[Blue]Let's get started!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:GARYOAK,"Blue",_I("Not too shabby."),false,0,true)
 @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
 @>Text: Blue looks at you quizzically, before reaching into his pocket, and pulling out two items.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue]Exp Share, or Lucky Egg?
 @>Show Choices: Exp Share, Lucky Egg
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Exp Share]
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:EXPSHARE)
  @>Text: \xn[Blue]The Exp Share splits the Experience with another member of the team. I hear it can be upgraded to an Exp All if you have the resources.
  @>Text: You know, I got a friend who may want to battle with you, wanna come to our cabin and check him out?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: Sweet. Follow me.
   @>Transfer Player:[018: Red and Blue's Cabin], (007,003)
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: Okay then, have fun.
   @>Jump to Label: LeavingDefault
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lucky Egg]
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:LUCKYEGG)
  @>Text: \xn[Blue]The Lucky Egg gives you a massive boost of experience for the Pokemon holding the Egg if it partakes in combat.
  @>Text: You know, I got a friend who may want to battle with you, wanna come to our cabin and check him out?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: Sweet. Follow me.
   @>Transfer Player:[018: Red and Blue's Cabin], (007,003)
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: Okay then, have fun.
   @>Jump to Label: LeavingDefault
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Good job! You tried your best, and that's what matters.
 @>Label: LeavingDefault
 @>Set Move Route: [Blue]
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Graphic: (None)
 @>Text: \xn[Old Man] I really cannot understand obsessive 
  :    : battlers like that.

Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Call Common Event: Teleport Statues
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 007
Event Name: AncientStone
(X,Y): (044,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0050: CharacterClass] == 0
 @>Text: This is a spirit statue. Once activated, the spirit inside 
  :    : will lend you some of its power.
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: This statue has a fist-shaped mark on it.
@>Text: Activate statue?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Control Variables: [0050: CharacterClass] = 2
 @>Text: The Warrior's Spirit was released.
 @>Text: Bug and Fighting-type moves do additional damage.
 @>Text: In addition, there is a slight chance that a move won't 
  :    : use any PP.
 @>Text: Every statue that you find also works as a teleport 
  :    : point.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: Gary
(X,Y): (025,036)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0206: Rock Gone is ON

Graphic: trchar071

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Hey, \PN!
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0204: Remet Red] == ON
 @>Show Choices: Red sent me., Hey.
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Red sent me.]
  @>Text: Really now? 
  @>Show Choices: Nod., Say yes.
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Nod.]
   @>Text: Now that nod IS Red.
   @>
  : When [Say yes.]
   @>Text: Just like Red to stay completely quiet, then show up.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: What did he want?
  @>Text: He's planning to get off the Island?
  @>Text: Even if it's to a different island, I am for it. Three Bros 
   :    : on an ocean adventure.
  @>Text: I'm gonna follow you, okay?
  @>Script: pbRegisterPartner(
  :       :   :POKEMONTRAINER_Blue,
  :       :   "Blue")
  @>Text: Let's get going.
  @>Control Switches: [0205: Collected Blue] = ON
  @>
 : When [Hey.]
  @>Jump to Label: Yeah.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Yeah.
 @>Text: Whatcha need?
 @>Show Choices: Just checking up., POKeMON battle., Can we team up?, Nevermind.
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Just checking up.]
  @>Text: Well, I'm fine, thanks for asking.
  @>
 : When [POKeMON battle.]
  @>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:GARYOAK)
  @>Script: Kernel.pbNoticePlayer(get_character(0))
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0138: BATTLESWITCH] == ON
   @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0206: Rock Gone] == ON
    @>Text: \xn[Blue]Here's Round 3, Pal!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \xn[Blue]Here's Round 2, Pal!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:GARYOAK3,"Blue",,false,0,true)
   @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
   @>Text: Well, damn. You beat me again.
   @>Text: I guess it is to be expected, Red always beats me 
    :    : too.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
   @>Text: One win for Team Oak.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Can we team up?]
  @>Text: Sure, I guess?
  @>Comment: Creates a partner trainer to battle alongside the 
   :       : player. The parameters are the trainer type and 
   :       : name of the partner. The partner trainer is defined 
   :       : in trainers.txt just like any other trainer.
  @>Script: pbRegisterPartner(
  :       :   :POKEMONTRAINER_Blue,
  :       :   "Blue")
  @>Text: Let's get going.
  @>Control Switches: [0209: CollectedBlueEarly] = ON
  @>
 : When [Nevermind.]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event Name: Craft It Bench
(X,Y): (001,000)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0150: CRAFTING is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Loop
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0144: POKEBALL] == OFF
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:WOODENPLANKS)>8
   @>Text: You realize you could probably make a Pokeball 
    :    : crafting station.
   @>Text: It would take 8 Wooden Planks.
   @>Text: Would you like to?
   @>Show Choices: Sure., Not right now.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Sure.]
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Turn Up
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:WOODENPLANKS,8)
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: You quickly make a pokeball crafting station, and 
     :    : place it down.
    @>Control Switches: [0144: POKEBALL] = ON
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [Not right now.]
    @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: Crafting Start
   @>Show Choices: Herbal Medicine, Vitamins, Mulch, Other
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Herbal Medicine]
    @>Show Choices: Heal Powder, Energy Powder, Berry Juice
    (When Cancel: Branch)
    : When [Heal Powder]
     @>Text: Would you like to craft Heal Powder?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:LUMBERRY)
       @>Text: How many?
       @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 3 digit(s)
       @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0255: ABILITIES] != 0
        @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::LUMBERRY)>=pbGet(255)
         @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::HEALPOWDER,pbGet(0005))
          @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::HEALPOWDER,pbGet(0005))
          @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::LUMBERRY,pbGet(0005))
          @>
         : Else
          @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
          @>
         : Branch End
         @>
        : Else
         @>Text: You don't have that many Berries.
         @>
        : Branch End
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Choices: Continue Crafting, Cancel
       (When Cancel: Choice 2)
       : When [Continue Crafting]
        @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
        @>

      : Branch End

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0147: CAULDRON] == OFF
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:IRON2)>5
   @>Text: You could probably make a Cauldron out of iron for 
    :    : more advanced crafting recipes.
   @>Text: It will take 6 Iron.
   @>Text: Would you like to?
   @>Show Choices: Sure., Not right now.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Sure.]
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Turn Up
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:IRON2,6)
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: You quickly make a Cauldron, and 
     :    : place it down.
    @>Control Switches: [0147: CAULDRON] = ON
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [Not right now.]
    @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
  @>
 : Else
  @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Repeat Above
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 006
Event Name: CAULDRON
(X,Y): (002,000)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0147: CAULDRON is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: What item do you wish to craft?
@>Loop
 @>Show Choices: Potions, Status-Curing, Revives, Ethers
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Potions]
  @>Show Choices: Super Potion, Hyper Potion, Max Potion, Full Restore
  (When Cancel: Branch)

   (When Cancel: Choice 2)

   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: How many?\a3
    @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 2 digit(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::REVIVALHERB)>=pbGet(0255)
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::QUALOTBERRY)>=pbGet(0255)
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::REVIVE,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::REVIVE,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::REVIVALHERB,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::QUALOTBERRY,pbGet(0005))
       @>
      : Else
       @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Else
      @>Text: You don't have enough ingredients to craft this item.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You don't have enough ingredients to craft this item.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Max Revive]
   @>Text: Max Revive?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: How many?\a3
    @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 2 digit(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::REVIVALHERB)>=pbGet(0255)
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::QUALOTBERRY)>=pbGet(0255)
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::HONDEWBERRY)>=pbGet(0255)
       @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::FULLRESTORE,pbGet(0005))
        @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::MAXREVIVE,pbGet(0005))
        @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::REVIVALHERB,pbGet(0005))
        @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::QUALOTBERRY,pbGet(0005))
        @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::HONDEWBERRY,pbGet(0005))

 : When [Ethers]

   @>Show Choices: Yes, No

       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::TAMATOBERRY,pbGet(0005))

   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: How many?\a3
    @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 2 digit(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::LEPPABERRY)>=pbGet(0255)
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::TAMATOBERRY)>=pbGet(0255)*2
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::ELIXIR,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::ELIXIR,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::LEPPABERRY,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::TAMATOBERRY,pbGet(0005)*2)
       @>
      : Else
       @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Else

      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You don't have enough ingredients to craft this item.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Max Elixir]
   @>Text: Max Elixir?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: How many?\a3
    @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 2 digit(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::LEPPABERRY)>=pbGet(0255)*2
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::TAMATOBERRY)>=pbGet(0255)*2
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::MAXELIXIR,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::MAXELIXIR,pbGet(0005))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::LEPPABERRY,pbGet(0005)*2)
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::TAMATOBERRY,pbGet(0005)*2)
       @>
      : Else
       @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Else
      @>Text: You don't have enough ingredients to craft this item.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You don't have enough ingredients to craft this item.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>Break Loop
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Repeat Above
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 009
Event Name: EV009
(X,Y): (003,000)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0144: POKEBALL is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Loop
 @>Label: Crafting Start
 @>Text: What Ball type do you wish to craft?
 @>Show Choices: Pokeball, Great Ball, Ultra Ball, Specialty Balls
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Pokeball]
  @>Text: Would you like to craft this item?
  @>Text: It needs Red Apricorns.
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:REDAPRICORN)
    @>Text: How many?
    @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 3 digit(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0255: ABILITIES] != 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::REDAPRICORN)>=pbGet(0255)
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::POKEBALL,pbGet(0255))
       @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::POKEBALL,pbGet(0255))
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::REDAPRICORN,pbGet(0255))
       @>
      : Else
       @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Else
      @>Text: You don't have that many Apricorns.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>Show Choices: Continue Crafting, Cancel
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Continue Crafting]
     @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
     @>
    : When [Cancel]
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>

          @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::LEVELBALL,pbGet(0005))
          @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::BLACKAPRICORN,pbGet(0005))
          @>
         : Else
          @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
          @>
         : Branch End
         @>
        : Else
         @>Text: You don't have that many Apricorns.
         @>
        : Branch End
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Choices: Continue Crafting, Cancel
       (When Cancel: Choice 2)
       : When [Continue Crafting]
        @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
        @>
       : When [Cancel]
        @>Exit Event Processing
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : When [Heavy Ball]
     @>Text: Would you like to craft this item?
     @>Text: It needs White Apricorns.
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:WHITEAPRICORN)
       @>Text: How many?\ap
       @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 3 digit(s)
       @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0255: ABILITIES] != 0
        @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::WHITEAPRICORN)>=pbGet(0255)
         @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(PBItems::HEAVYBALL,pbGet(0005))
          @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::HEAVYBALL,pbGet(0005))
          @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::WHITEAPRICORN,pbGet(0005))
          @>
         : Else
          @>Text: You have no room left in the Bag.
          @>
         : Branch End
         @>
        : Else
         @>Text: You don't have that many Apricorns.
         @>
        : Branch End
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Choices: Continue Crafting, Cancel
       (When Cancel: Choice 2)
       : When [Continue Crafting]
        @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
        @>
       : When [Cancel]
        @>Exit Event Processing
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : When [[Next]]
     @>Show Choices: Love Ball, Moon Ball, Dream Ball, Cancel.
     (When Cancel: Disallow)
     : When [Love Ball]
      @>Text: Would you like to craft this item?
      @>Text: It needs Pink Apricorns.
      @>Show Choices: Yes, No
      (When Cancel: Choice 2)
      : When [Yes]
       @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PINKAPRICORN)
        @>Text: How many?\ap
        @>Input Number: [0255: ABILITIES], 3 digit(s)
        @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0255: ABILITIES] != 0
         @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(PBItems::PINKAPRICORN)>=pbGet(0255)

           @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::LOVEBALL,pbGet(0005))
           @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(PBItems::PINKAPRICORN,pbGet(0005))

          @>
         : Else
          @>Text: You don't have that many Apricorns.
          @>

      (When Cancel: Choice 2)

       @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
       @>
      : When [Quit]
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : When Cancel
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When Cancel
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>Break Loop
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Repeat Above
@>

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This is debug rock.
@>Text: He is here to help if something isn't working.
@>Show Choices: No Follower, Start Items Missing, Start Items missing2, Next
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [No Follower]
 @>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
 @>
: When [Start Items Missing]
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:CRAFTBOOK)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MAP)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PHONE)
 @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.runningShoes=true
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:RUSTEDPICKAXE)
 @>Text: a
 @>
: When [Start Items missing2]
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SQUIRTBOTTLE)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PLAYER)
 @>Script: $Trainer.pokedex=true
 @>Script: $Trainer.pokegear=true
 @>Control Switches: [0268: Hasbag] = ON
 @>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = OFF
 @>Text: a
 @>
: When [Next]
 @>Show Choices: Difficulty, Nuzlocke, Player, Next
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Difficulty]
  @>Text: \ch[204,-1, Easy,Normal,Hard]
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 0
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 0
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 1
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 1
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 2
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Control Variables: [0031: DifficultyModifier] = 50
  @>
 : When [Nuzlocke]
  @>Show Choices: Normal, Softlocke, Nuzlocke
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Normal]
   @>Call Common Event: Nuzlocke
   @>
  : When [Softlocke]
   @>
  : When [Nuzlocke]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Player]
  @>Show Choices: A, B, C, D
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [A]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
   @>
  : When [B]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(1)
   @>
  : When [C]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(2)
   @>
  : When [D]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(3)
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Next]
  @>Show Choices: Unlock Crafting Recipes., I need Mega Bracelet, Remove Stone Temple Rocks, Next
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Unlock Crafting Recipes.]
   @>Script: setupCraftUnlocks
   @>
  : When [I need Mega Bracelet]
   @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MEGARING)
   @>
  : When [Remove Stone Temple Rocks]
   @>Control Switches: [0119: TEMPLEROCKS] = OFF
   @>
  : When [Next]
   @>Show Choices: Mamoswine party full, Sky, I have Waterfall, not  Dive!, Next
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Mamoswine party full]
    @>Show Choices: Yeah, I could., I could leave it sleeping too.
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yeah, I could.]
     @>Show Choices: POKeBALL, Great Ball, Ultraball, I don't have any.
     (When Cancel: Choice 4)
     : When [POKeBALL]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:POKEBALL)
       @>Set Move Route: Player
        :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:POKEBALL)
       @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
       :       : pkmn.form=1
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
       :       : pkmn.happiness=0
       :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
       @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
        :    : being caught.
       @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [Great Ball]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:GREATBALL)
       @>Set Move Route: Player
        :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:GREATBALL)
       @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
       :       : pkmn.form=1
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)

None

Graphic: 051

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: What are you going to do?
@>Label: Start
@>Show Choices: Craft, Prepare Meat, Pick Up, Cancel
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Craft]
 @>Script: Crafts.craftWindow
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Prepare Meat]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
  @>Text: What kind of Monster eats a Pokemon Egg.
  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
  @>Text: The Shadow Pokemon thrashes too much to easily be food.
  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($Trainer)
  @>Text: This POKeMON belonged to someone else.
  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \bAre you sure you want to prepare your \v[3] for food?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You cut up your POKeMON for food.
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MEAT,(rand(6))
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Didnt delete.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Pick Up]
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Cauldron?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:CAULDRON)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

@>Script: Kernel.pbNoticePlayer(get_character(0))
@>Play SE: '074Cry', 80, 100
@>Text: Gaoo!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:GEODUDE,2+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party),51,false)
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (018,024)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 241

Autonomous Movement
Type: Random
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:WATERBOTTLE)
 @>Text: You milk the cow, gaining a few bottle of milk.
 @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:MOOMOOMILK)
 @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:WATERBOTTLE)
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You don't have a water bottle.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Random
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

 @>Text: You don't want to take too much Milk from these poor cows.
 @>

Event ID: 007
Event Name: EV007
(X,Y): (010,049)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0154: MadeBase] == ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: It's late, you should head to bed.
 @>Text: You lay down on the cold hard ground to rest.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
  @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Page #2
Conditions

   :              : $>Turn Left

   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Turn Down

Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0148: Transfer2] == OFF
 @>Text: You get the idea you could mine a way between the 
  :    : two bases.
 @>Text: It would probably break your pickaxe though.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PICKAXE)
  @>Text: Start mining the tunnel?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:PICKAXE)
   @>Control Switches: [0148: Transfer2] = ON
   @>Play SE: 'Exit Door', 80, 100
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (255,255,255,255), @6
   @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
   @>Transfer Player:[010: Temperate Base], (012,013), No Fade
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: Egg
(X,Y): (011,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: crate

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \bLooking over at your Pokemon, you are taken by surprise because there is an Egg.
 @>Text: \bDo you pick it up?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN picked up the Egg.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Show Choices: Abandon Egg, Wait
  (When Cancel: Choice 3)
  : When [Abandon Egg]
   @>Text: \bYou will not be able to take this egg if you abandon it. Are you sure?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: \bYou have abandoned the Egg.
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
    :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Wait]
   @>Show Choices: Daycare, Leave
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Daycare]
    @>Jump to Label: Daycare
    @>
   : When [Leave]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
 @>Label: Daycare
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==0
  @>Text: This is the Daycare Area.
  @>Text: You realize you could leave a Pokemon here, and it 
   :    : would be safe.
  @>Show Choices: Leave a Pokemon., Rather not.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Leave a Pokemon.]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: Which Pokémon do you leave here for now?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: You decide against it.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Label: RaiseAnother
   @>Text: You realize you could probably leave two.
   @>Show Choices: Might as well., Nah.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Might as well.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: Which Pokémon should you leave here?
    @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Text: Now they are having a playdate.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
    @>
   : When [Nah.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
     @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You decide against it.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Rather not.]
   @>Text: You decide against it.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Taking a look at your Pokemon...
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: TakeBack
   @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Label: TakeBackChosen
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
     @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
    :       : _I("Which one are you taking back?"),1)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1),3,4)
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rYou pick back up \v[3].
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
     @>Text: \rDo you take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Type: Fixed

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: When you lose a battle, your health starts to 
 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Control Switches: [0249: ToldDyingSleep] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0205: Food] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0208: Sleep] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0206: Water] = 100
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: When you lose a battle, your health starts to 
 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Control Switches: [0249: ToldDyingSleep] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0273: ToldDyingWater] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0250: ToldDyingFood] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0205: Food] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0208: Sleep] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0206: Water] = 100
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF

 @>
: Else

  @>
 : Else

   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

Page #3
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: bed

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: When you lose a battle, your health starts to 
 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Control Switches: [0249: ToldDyingSleep] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0273: ToldDyingWater] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0250: ToldDyingFood] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0205: Food] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0208: Sleep] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0206: Water] = 100
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 @>Text: There is a Crude Power Station here, it uses Charcoal to run.
 @>Text: \GWhat do you do?
 @>Show Choices: Power It., Pick it up., Exit
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [Power It.]

  @>
 : When [Pick it up.]

  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]

   @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:COALGENERATOR)
   @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Exit]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else

   : When [No]
    @>

   @>

   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else

   (When Cancel: Choice 3)
   : When [Power It.]

     @>Control Variables: [0288] -= 1
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:COALGENERATOR)
     @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF

    @>
   : When [Exit]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>

     @>Control Switches: [0466] = ON

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (007,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This area can be used for farming.
@>Show Choices: Miltank, Berry Trees
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Miltank]
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
 @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isSpecies?(:MILTANK)
  @>Text: Do you want to let your Miltank graze?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(pbGet(1))
    @>Control Variables: [0400: Miltank] += 1
    @>Text: You let your Miltank graze.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>Text: You do not have enough POKeMON to delete.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: That Pokemon wouldn't give you anything.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Berry Trees]
 @>Text: You could plant Big Berry trees.
 @>Text: Do you want to plant them?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:ORANBERRY,4)
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:ACORN,2)
    @>Control Variables: [0399: OranBerry] += 1
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: You can spend 500 Wood to make Greenhouses.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:WOODENPLANKS)>=500
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:WOODENPLANKS,500)
   @>Script: Achievements.incrementProgress("GREENHOUSE",1)
   @>Control Switches: [0203: Better Farm] = ON
   @>Transfer Player:[146: Temperate Zone], (009,019)
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Delete Error.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Amount Error.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:MEDICINEPOT)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

 @>Text: It seems pleased with your progress.
 @>Text: It points it's wing at your bag, specifically the main pocket.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (011,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 473

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:POKEFLUTE)
 @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
  @>Text: There's a sleeping POKeMON here.
  @>Text: Play the POKeFLUTE?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play BGM: 'Radio - Lullaby', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: The Mamoswine still looks tired, but it isn't angry or 
    :    : anything, it walks a bit to the right.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Turn away from Player
    :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: There's a sleeping POKeMON here.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: 473

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Turn away from Player
 :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
@>Text: The Mamoswine is asleep again.
@>Text: It sure likes to sleep a lot.
@>Text: It's looking away, so would could catch it.
@>Fade Out BGM: 10 sec.
@>Show Choices: Yeah, I could., I could leave it sleeping too.
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yeah, I could.]
 @>Show Choices: POKeBALL, Great Ball, Ultraball, I don't have any.
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [POKeBALL]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:POKEBALL)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:POKEBALL)
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
   :       : pkmn.form=1
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
   :       : pkmn.happiness=0
   :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
   @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
    :    : being caught.
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Great Ball]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:GREATBALL)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:GREATBALL)
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
   :       : pkmn.form=1
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
   :       : pkmn.happiness=0
   :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
   @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
    :    : being caught.
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Ultraball]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:ULTRABALL)
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:ULTRABALL)
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
   :       : pkmn.form=1
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
   :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
   :       : pkmn.happiness=0
   :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
   @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
    :    : being caught.
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [I don't have any.]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [I could leave it sleeping too.]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Conditions

Self Switch B is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed

Options Enabled

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (012,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This Xatu is a skilled mimic. It can mimic many useful 
 :    : NPCs.
@>Show Choices: Rename Pokemon, Delete Move, Learn Move, Next
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Rename Pokemon]
 @>Text: \bHello, hello!\nI am the official Name Rater!
 @>Text: \bWant me to rate the nicknames of your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon's nickname should I critique?
  @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon. The index 
   :       : is stored in Game Variable 1, and the name in Game 
   :       : Variable 3.
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: Check for eggs.
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
   @>Text: \bNow, now... That is merely an Egg!
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
   @>Text: \bI wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($Trainer)
   @>Text: \bHmmm... \v[3] it is!
   @>Text: \bThis is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
    :    : beyond reproach!
   @>Text: \bYou'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
    :    : beyond.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \b\v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
  @>Text: \bBut, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
  @>Text: \bHow about it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: \bAh, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
   :       : pbSet(4, species)
   :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
   :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
    @>Comment: The Pokémon's nickname wasn't changed.
    @>Text: \bI see. You're right, there's no need to change this 
     :    : Pokémon's nickname.
    @>Text: \bIt already had a superb name!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == "" || pbGet(5) == pbGet(4)
     @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
     @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.name = nil
     :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
     @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
      :    : as \v[3]!
     @>Text: \bIt looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
      :    : vastly superior!
     @>Text: \bHow fortunate for you!
     @>
    : Else
     @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon whose party index is stored in 
      :       : Game Variable 1, and changes its name to the name 
      :       : stored in Game Variable 5.
     @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
     @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
      :    : as \v[5]!
     @>Text: \bIt is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
      :    : you!
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Delete Move]
 @>Text: \bUh...\nOh, yes, I'm the Move Deleter.
 @>Text: \bI can make Pokémon forget their moves.
 @>Text: \bWould you like me to do that?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
    :    : forgotten.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
    @>Text: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: \bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
     :    : move.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves == 1
    @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move...
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
   @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1), 2, 4)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
     @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
     @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).forget_move_at_index(
     :       :    pbGet(2))
     @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
     @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
      :    : forgotten.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Learn Move]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: isTempSwitchOff?("A")
  @>Text: \bI'm the Pokémon Move Maniac.
  @>Text: \bI know every single move that Pokémon learn 
   :    : growing up.
  @>Text: \bI'm also a collector of Heart Scales.
  @>Text: \bIf you bring me one, I'll teach a move to one of your 
   :    : Pokémon.
  @>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:HEARTSCALE)
  @>Text: \bOh! That's it! That's an honest to goodness Heart 
   :    : Scale!
  @>Text: \bLet me guess, you want me to teach one of your 
   :    : Pokémon a move?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon needs tutoring?
   @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
   :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
   :       :   }, true
   :       : )
   @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
    :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
     @>Text: \bHunh? There isn't a single move that I can teach an 
      :    : Egg.
     @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
     @>Text: \bNo way, I don't want to go near a Shadow 
      :    : Pokémon..
     @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
     @>Text: \bSorry...
     @>Text: \bIt doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach 
      :    : to your \v[3].
     @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: \bWhich move should I teach to your \v[3]?
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
     @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:HEARTSCALE)
     @>Text: \PN handed over one Heart Scale in exchange.
     @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
      :    : with a Heart Scale.
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
      :    : with a Heart Scale.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
    :    : with a Heart Scale.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
   :    : with a Heart Scale.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Next]
 @>Show Choices: Special Move Tutor, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Special Move Tutor]
  @>Text: \rHello! I'm a Move Tutor!
  @>Text: \rI can teach a special and powerful move to your 
   :    : Pokémon.
  @>Label: Start
  @>Text: \rWhich special move would you like me to teach?
  @>Show Choices: Frenzy Plant, Blast Burn, Hydro Cannon, Exit
  (When Cancel: Choice 4)
  : When [Frenzy Plant]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbMoveTutorChoose(:FRENZYPLANT)
    @>Text: \rWould you like me to teach another Pokémon a 
     :    : special move?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Jump to Label: Start
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Blast Burn]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbMoveTutorChoose(:BLASTBURN)
    @>Text: \rWould you like me to teach another Pokémon a 
     :    : special move?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Jump to Label: Start
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Hydro Cannon]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbMoveTutorChoose(:HYDROCANNON)
    @>Text: \rWould you like me to teach another Pokémon a 
     :    : special move?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Jump to Label: Start
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Exit]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \rCome back any time!
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (024,024)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Type in a Pokemon's name.
@>Show Choices: Let's do it!, Not right now...
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Let's do it!]
 @>Label: pkmnselect
 @>Script: pbTextEntry("Enter the name of a Pokemon or Type.",0,10,3)
 @>Script: pbSetUpcase(3)
 @>Script: pbFixCommonStarterSpellingErrors(3)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: !hasConst?(PBSpecies,pbGet(3))
  @>Text: That's not a Pokemon. Check your spelling!
  @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbLegendaryStarter?(3)
  @>Text: You cannot select a Legendary Pokemon. That would be a little overpowered, wouldn't it?
  @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbIsLowestEvolutionStarter?(3)
  @>Script: pbSetGameVariables(12,3)
  @>
 : Else
  @>Script: pbSetBaseEvolutionStarter(15,3)
  @>Text: \v[3] is an evolved Pokemon.
  @>Text: Its lowest form, \v[15], will be selected instead.
  @>Script: pbSetGameVariables(12,15)
  :       : pbSetUpcase(12)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to select \v[12]?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pkmn = getConst(PBSpecies,pbGet(12))
  :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,12)
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Try again.
  @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Not right now...]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:

@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[092: Xatu Inn], (008,013), No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0022: s:tsOff?("A") is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: get_character(0).onEvent?
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
 @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
@>

 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes, after I ate shrooms.]

  : When [[Let him continue.]]
   @>

 : When [Yes.]

 @>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Gary
(X,Y): (032,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar071

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Makes this event follow the player. The first 
 :       : parameter means "this event", the second is a name 
 :       : for that dependency, and the third is the Common 
 :       : Event number run when this following event is 
 :       : interacted with.
@>Comment: Creates a partner trainer to battle alongside the 
 :       : player. The parameters are the trainer type and 
 :       : name of the partner. The partner trainer is defined 
 :       : in trainers.txt just like any other trainer.
@>Script: pbRegisterPartner(
:       :   :POKEMONTRAINER_Blue,
:       :   "Blue")
@>Comment: Note that the above two features are entirely 
 :       : unrelated. You can have a dependent event which 
 :       : isn't also a partner trainer (e.g. escort mission), or a 
 :       : partner trainer who doesn't visibly follow you around.
@>Text: \PN teamed up with Blue!\me[Item get]\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Blue] We got this.
@>Control Switches: [0238: DisableGary] = ON
@>

Graphic: 178-xatu

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: The Xatu looks at you, then at your Pokemon.
@>Text: It nods slightly, then levitates an item towards you.
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:TM58)

  :    : useful items, but I don't have any Star Pieces.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:STARPIECE)
  @>Text: Offer a Star Piece?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: Is that a Star Piece?
   @>Text: Thanks.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [I have your bag.]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:BLUEBAG)
  @>Text: Oh thanks, I nearly forgot that again.
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:BLUEBAG)
  @>Text: Have this.
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:GSCURRY,3)
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [I have your PC.]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:BLUEBAG)
  @>Text: Put. That. Back.
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Goodbye.]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : to work through the pain.

: When [Oran Berry]

 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON

  :    : type of berry.

 @>
: When [Next]
 @>Show Choices: Wiki Berry, Mago Berry, Aguav Berry, Next

 : When [Wiki Berry]
  @>Text: It is healed a little bit, but it does not seem to like this 
   :    : type of berry.
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:BALMMUSHROOM,1)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [Mago Berry]
  @>Text: It is healed a little bit. It seems to really like the berry!
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SHINYSTONE,1)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [Aguav Berry]
  @>Text: It is healed a little bit, but it does not seem to like this 
   :    : type of berry.

  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [Next]

  : When [Iapapa Berry]
   @>Text: It is healed a little bit, but it does not seem to like this 
    :    : type of berry.

   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>

   @>Text: It is healed a little bit. It seems greatful enough.

   @>

    @>

    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:BLUESCARF,1)

@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0132: HOUSE] == ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0495: HomeUpstairs] == ON
  @>Text: It offers you a book. It is about potential.
  @>Text: You take the book.
  @>Control Switches: [0493: PotentialBook] = ON
  @>Text: It hopes you have a good day.
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 095
Map Name: Reviver Xatu Home
Tileset: 024: Temple
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (012,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This Xatu is not only a Skilled Mimic, but a Powerful Psychic.
@>Text: It can mimic the Fossil Reviver.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
  @>Text: \bOh, hello. I'm a scientist.
  @>Text: \bI can turn fossils into living, breathing Pokémon!
  @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bAiyah! You come again!
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: \bWhich fossil do you want me to revive?
   @>Script: pbChooseFossil(9)
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(9) != :NONE
    @>Comment: Player didn't choose a fossil.
    @>Text: \bLet me know when you want me to revive a 
     :    : fossil for you.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Comment: Player chose a fossil.
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(pbGet(9))
    @>Script: data = GameData::Item.get(pbGet(9))
    :       : pbSet(3, data.name)
    @>Text: \bOkay. I'll see if I can revive your \v[3].
    @>Text: \bCome back later.
    @>Comment: Convert fossil into species now.
    @>Script: conversion_hash = {
    :       :   :HELIXFOSSIL => :OMANYTE,
    :       :   :DOMEFOSSIL  => :KABUTO,
    :       :   :OLDAMBER    => :AERODACTYL,
    :       :   :ROOTFOSSIL  => :LILEEP,
    :       :   :CLAWFOSSIL  => :ANORITH,
    :       :   :SKULLFOSSIL => :CRANIDOS,
    :       :   :ARMORFOSSIL => :SHIELDON
    :       : }
    @>Script: conversion_hash.merge!({
    :       :   :COVERFOSSIL => :TIRTOUGA,
    :       :   :PLUMEFOSSIL => :ARCHEN,
    :       :   :JAWFOSSIL   => :TYRUNT,
    :       :   :SAILFOSSIL  => :AMAURA
    :       : })
    @>Script: item = pbGet(9)
    :       : species = conversion_hash[item]
    :       : pbSet(9, species)
    @>Script: pbSetEventTime
    @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
    @>Control Switches: [0013: Fossil revival in progress] = ON
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Comment: Player doesn't want to choose a fossil.
   @>Text: \bI'll be here if you want my help.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \bDo you have a fossil for me?
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions

Options Enabled

List of Event Commands:

Page #3
Conditions
Switch 0121: s: cooledDown?(18000) is ON
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0009: Fossil being revived] > 0
 @>Text: \bWhere have you been? I've finished reviving your
  :    : fossil.
 @>Script: pbSet(3,PBSpecies.getName(pbGet(9)))
 @>Text: \bIt was \v[3] like I thought.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbAddToParty(pbGet(9),1)
  @>Control Variables: [0009: Fossil being revived] = 0
  @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bYou have no room left. Make room, then come see 
   :    : me.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bI managed to revive your fossil.
 @>Text: \bHowever, what I brought back didn't live long...\1 
  :    : fortunately.
 @>Text: \bSorry.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This Xatu is willing to Psychically replicate Casino Games for you!
@>Text: However, the Rewards you get are all Psychic as well.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbReceiveItem(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: That Coin Case is Psychic too.
 @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins+=500
 @>Text: So are those coins.
 @>Label: Addiction
 @>Show Choices: Voltorb Flip, Slots, Buy Coins., No thanks.
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Voltorb Flip]
  @>Script: pbVoltorbFlip
  @>
 : When [Slots]
  @>Script: pbSlotMachine
  @>
 : When [Buy Coins.]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:STARPIECE)
   @>Text: Do you trade 1 Star Piece for 250 Coins?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:STARPIECE)
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins+=250
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Jump to Label: Addiction
  @>
 : When [No thanks.]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #5
Conditions
Switch 0222: Freed Xatu is ON
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This Xatu is willing to Psychically replicate Casino Games for you!
@>Text: However, the Rewards you get are all Psychic as well.
@>Show Choices: Voltorb Flip, Slots, Buy Coins., More
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Voltorb Flip]
 @>Script: pbVoltorbFlip
 @>
: When [Slots]
 @>Script: pbSlotMachine
 @>
: When [Buy Coins.]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:STARPIECE)
  @>Text: Do you trade 1 Star Piece for 250 Coins?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:STARPIECE)
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins+=250
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Addiction
 @>
: When [More]
 @>Show Choices: Poker, Blackjack, Roulette, Race Course
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Poker]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins<500
   @>Text: You don't have enough coins.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins-=500
   @>Script: Pokepoker.new(500,10)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0292: Chips] == 0
   @>Text: It looks apologetic.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: It gives you your chips.
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins+=pbGet(292)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Blackjack]
  @>Script: BlackJack.play
  @>
 : When [Roulette]
  @>Script: pbRoulette(250)
  @>
 : When [Race Course]
  @>Script: pbRaceGame
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  :    : Old Gateau - 1000 coins,Rage Candy Bar - 1000 coins,

 :       :       :SWEETHEART,:EGGEDIBLE,

 :       : price=[1000,1000,1000,2000,2000,0

 @>Script: pbSet(1, item)
 :       : pbSet(2, price)

 :       :   data = GameData::Species.get(item)

 :       : end
 :       : pbSet(4, lv)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] > 0

  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2)>$PokemonGlobal.coins
    @>Text: \CN\bSorry, you'll need more coins than that.
    @>
   : Else

     @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.coins-=pbGet(2)
     @>Script: pbReceiveItem(pbGet(1))
     @>
    : Else

     @>

    @>

 : Branch End

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's impressive Blue managed to get a Bed.
@>Text: Maybe he pulled it out of the Wreckage?
@>Text: Sleep?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
 @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Call Save Screen
 @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
  @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>
 : Else
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Left
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End

 : Else

   @>

     :    : *that* bad...

   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End

: Branch End

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Cro
(X,Y): (030,025)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 453s

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0226: IceCaveReturn] == ON
 @>Text: This Croagrunk is just sitting here.
 @>Text: He looks at you in a well thought through manner.
 @>Text: He ribbits.
 @>Text: He croaks.
 @>Text: He gestures at the dock.
 @>Text: If you can get him 50 Wooden Planks, he can get you 
  :    : down this river.
 @>Show Choices: Okay., Nokay.
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Okay.]
  @>Show Choices: I am ready., Not ready.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [I am ready.]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:WOODENPLANKS)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:WOODENPLANKS,50)
     @>Text: You can set forth.
     @>Show Choices: Go Now., Wait.
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Go Now.]
      @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
      @>Text: He takes you down the river for hours.
      @>Text: He is telling stories on the way.
      @>Text: Not that... you can TELL, you don't SPEAK Croagunk.
      @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 57600
      @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (025,016)
      @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-17,0,-34,136), @20
      @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
      @>
     : When [Wait.]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You do not have enough Wooden Planks.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: You do not have enough Wooden Planks.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Not ready.]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Nokay.]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: This Croagrunk is just sitting here.
 @>Text: He seems to intentionally be zoning you out.
 @>
: Branch End
@>
