Event ID: 039
Event Name: EV039
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0410: Sprinkler is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:SPRINKLER)
 @>Text: Place Sprinkler?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:SPRINKLER)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You could put a Sprinkler here, if you had one.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: berrytreeBLUKBERRY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0468: Off] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0468: Off] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: You turn it off.
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0468: Off] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0468: Off] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: You turn it on.
   @>Control Switches: [0468: Off] = ON
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 039
Event Name: EV039
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0410: Sprinkler is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:SPRINKLER)
 @>Text: Place Sprinkler?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:SPRINKLER)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You could put a Sprinkler here, if you had one.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: berrytreeBLUKBERRY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0469] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0469] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0469] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0469] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0469] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:SPRINKLER)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You could put a Sprinkler here, if you had one.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: berrytreeBLUKBERRY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0470] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0470] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0470] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0470] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0470] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 039
Event Name: EV039
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0410: Sprinkler is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:SPRINKLER)
 @>Text: Place Sprinkler?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:SPRINKLER)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You could put a Sprinkler here, if you had one.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: berrytreeBLUKBERRY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0472] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0472] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0472] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0472] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0472] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0473] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0473] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 039
Event Name: EV039
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0410: Sprinkler is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:SPRINKLER)
 @>Text: Place Sprinkler?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:SPRINKLER)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You could put a Sprinkler here, if you had one.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: berrytreeBLUKBERRY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0475: HomeBook] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0475: HomeBook] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0475: HomeBook] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0475: HomeBook] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0475: HomeBook] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0291: PowerMeter] == 0
 @>Control Switches: [0467] = OFF
 @>Text: The System is out of power.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0467] == ON
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is spritzing away. Turn it off?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
   @>Control Switches: [0467] = OFF
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>

   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: You turn it off.
    @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] -= 1
    @>Control Switches: [0467] = OFF
    @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SPRINKLER)
    @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Sprinkler is off. Turn it on?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No, Pick it up.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: You turn it on.
   @>Control Variables: [0290: Power] += 1
   @>Control Switches: [0467] = ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Pick it up.]
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Sprinkler?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 005
Event Name: Crate
(X,Y): (016,028)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0406: PC is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PORTABLEPC)
 @>Text: Place Pokemon Crate?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:PORTABLEPC)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:ITEMCRATE)

Options Enabled

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This is Blue's Crate. Not yours. Why would your Pokemon be in it?

(When Cancel: Choice 2)

 : When [Blue's Pokemon Crate]

     @>Text: A level 34 Venemoth.

      @>Text: A level 34 Aerodactyl.
      @>

      @>

      @>Text: A level 31 Forretress.
      @>

      : When [Grumpig]
       @>Text: A level 34 Grumpig.
       @>
      : When [Absol]
       @>Text: A level 16 Absol.
       @>

        @>

     @>
    : Branch End

     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: Your party is full.
     @>

   @>

   @>Jump to Label: StartStart
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>

  @>

 : Branch End

List of Event Commands:
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>Text: \xn[Blue] We've passed by this island 5 times, Red.
@>Text: Red gestured wildly, greatly confused, and gesturing to the map.
@>Text: \xn[Blue] I know what the map says, but this is the last landmark on the map before it just repeats to the other side of the island.
@>Text: They both looked to your for your thoughts.
@>Show Choices: Continue looking., Just nod., Go back to the island., Stay Silent.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Continue looking.]
 @>Text: You advise just keep looking. You all are just clearly lost.
 @>Text: Red nodded, just a few more tries.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Look, it's gonna be night soon, we should head back to the island.
 @>Show Choices: Keep looking?, Head back.
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Keep looking?]
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Text: \xn[Blue] I said there was nothing else.
  @>Control Switches: [0186: search] = ON
  @>Text: \xn[Blue] Let's head back.
  @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
  @>
 : When [Head back.]
  @>Text: You decide to head back.
  @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Just nod.]
 @>Text: You just nod, letting them know you are listening.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Look, it's gonna be night soon, we should head back to the island.
 @>Text: Red seems to still have exploring on the mind, but accepts it.
 @>Text: You decide to head back.
 @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
 @>
: When [Go back to the island.]
 @>Text: You say it may be best just to head back to the island, clearly it isn't letting them leave.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Yeah, it's about to be night.
 @>Text: Red seems kinda nonplussed, but accepts it.
 @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
 @>
: When [Stay Silent.]
 @>Text: You just stay quiet.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Great. Two mutes.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Look, I am going to head back, you two do what you want.
 @>Text: Red looked at you, wondering what you both should do next.
 @>Show Choices: Follow Blue., Keep Looking.
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Follow Blue.]
  @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
  @>
 : When [Keep Looking.]
  @>Text: You decide to keep looking.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Set Move Route: [Blue]
   :              : $>Graphic: (None)
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6

  @>Text: Red was slouching a bit.
  @>Text: He decided it would be good to head back.
  @>Transfer Player:[161: Humid Area BRR], (040,017), Left
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Text: \xn [Blue] That area off east seems pretty interesting. I mean... for a cave.
 @>Text: Red nods.
 @>Text: \xn [Blue] I think tomorrow morning, I want to go check that out. Sound good to you guys?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: Red nods as well.
  @>Text: \xn [Blue] Well then, let's be up at crack of dawn then.
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Red nods, but seems surprised at your disagreement.
  @>Text: Blue seems quite sour at this, heading to Bed.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn [Blue] We didn't really explore that much, just immediately came and set up Camp.
 @>Text: \xn [Blue] I'm gonna head to bed to explore tomorrow.
 @>
: Branch End

 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: Red heads to bed as well.
@>Set Move Route: [Red]
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion

  @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
  @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.

   :    : exceptionally well.

 : Else

(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Use PC]
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: When [Pick Up]
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up the PC?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Control Switches: [0216: Cutsceneover] = ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

 @>
: Branch End

Event ID: 010
Event Name: EV010
(X,Y): (043,008)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0215: ForestCamp is ON

Graphic: bed

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0150: CRAFTING] == OFF
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:ACORN)>=4
  @>Text: As you get in your bed, you realize you could probably cut down and make a crafting station out those trees.
  @>Text: You spend the night while your Pokemon sleep doing 
   :    : as such.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
  @>Control Switches: [0150: CRAFTING] = ON
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Move Up
  @>Jump to Label: end
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Bedtime
 @>
: Else
 @>Jump to Label: Bedtime
 @>
: Branch End
@>Show Choices: Sleep, Rest Pokemon, Pick up Bedroll., Play with Pokemon
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Sleep]
 @>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
 @>Text: Would you like to rest and heal your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
   @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
   @>
  : Else
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
   @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Move Left
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Rest Pokemon]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: When [Pick up Bedroll.]
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your bedroll?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Play with Pokemon]
 @>Script: pokemonAmieRefresh
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: end
@>

Page #4
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: bed

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: When you lose a battle, your health starts to 
 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:WOODENPLANKS)>8
  @>Text: You realize you could probably make a Pokeball 
   :    : crafting station.
  @>Text: It would take 8 Wooden Planks.
  @>Text: Would you like to?
  @>Show Choices: Sure., Not right now.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Sure.]
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Turn Up
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:WOODENPLANKS,8)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: You quickly make a Apricorn Carving Station, and 
    :    : place it down.
   @>Control Switches: [0144: POKEBALL] = ON
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : When [Not right now.]
   @>Jump to Label: Crafting Start
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: EV008
(X,Y): (011,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \bLooking over at your Pokemon, you are taken by surprise because there is an Egg.
 @>Text: \bDo you pick it up?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN picked up the Egg.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Show Choices: Abandon Egg, Wait
  (When Cancel: Choice 3)
  : When [Abandon Egg]
   @>Text: \bYou will not be able to take this egg if you abandon it. Are you sure?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: \bYou have abandoned the Egg.
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
    :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Wait]
   @>Show Choices: Daycare, Leave
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Daycare]
    @>Jump to Label: Daycare
    @>
   : When [Leave]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
 @>Label: Daycare
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==0
  @>Text: This is the Daycare Area.
  @>Text: You realize you could leave a Pokemon here, and it 
   :    : would be safe.
  @>Show Choices: Leave a Pokemon., Rather not.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Leave a Pokemon.]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: Which Pokémon do you leave here for now?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: You decide against it.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Label: RaiseAnother
   @>Text: You realize you could probably leave two.
   @>Show Choices: Might as well., Nah.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Might as well.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: Which Pokémon should you leave here?
    @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Text: Now they are having a playdate.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
    @>
   : When [Nah.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
     @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You decide against it.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Rather not.]
   @>Text: You decide against it.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Taking a look at your Pokemon...
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: TakeBack
   @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Label: TakeBackChosen
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
     @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
    :       : _I("Which one are you taking back?"),1)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1),3,4)
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rYou pick back up \v[3].
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
     @>Text: \rDo you take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>

 @>Text: Neither of them seemed happy about this.

 @>Control Variables: [0252: Redlike] += 5
 @>

 @>Text: \xn[\PN] Look. Sometimes you just have to deal with what happens.
 @>Text: Both of them seemed kinda angry.
 @>Control Variables: [0253: Bluelike] -= 10
 @>Control Variables: [0252: Redlike] -= 10
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Blue] We'll trust your judgement for now.

 :              : $>Graphic: (None)

   :    : near the mine I would like you to get for me.

   :    : gonna go along with it.

   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Graphic: (None)

   :              : $>Graphic: (None)

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Leave it to the others.]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] We aren't from this island, yeah.

  :    : POKeMON in those cages.

  :    : problem with POKeMON attacking trainers recently,

  :    : and moved back a little bit.

  :              : $>Move Down

  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Turn Down

  :    : behind that fence?

 : When [Agreement]

   :    : grunts.

   :    : own business.

 : When [Hesitant]

   :    : seemed to pretty handedly taken the town.

Event ID: 001
Event Name: CutTree
(X,Y): (046,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:MACHETE)
 @>Text: Do you want to cut this tree down?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbEraseThisEvent
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You cannot cut this tree down.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Text: Celebi is sleeping there.
 @>Text: It wakes up, looking at you.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:CELEBI,20)
  @>
 : Else

  @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>

@>

(X,Y): (021,076)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0483: DeepCavesDungeon is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's a hole small enough for two POKeMON, want to send them through?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
 @>Script: $game_variables[398] = $Trainer.party.length
 @>Script: pbSelectPokeTransform
 @>Text: It wishes you good luck.
 @>Wait: 1 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: $game_variables[402] = $Trainer.second_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[403] = $Trainer.third_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[404] = $Trainer.fourth_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[405] = $Trainer.fifth_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[406] = $Trainer.sixth_party.clone
  @>Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(5)
  @>Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(4)
  @>Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(3)
  @>Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(2)
  @>Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(1)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: $game_variables[401] = $Trainer.first_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[403] = $Trainer.third_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[404] = $Trainer.fourth_party.clone
  @>Script: $game_variables[405] = $Trainer.fifth_party.clone

     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (006,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: pirates

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[Crook B] Hey, You here to let us out?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Crook B] Thanks a bundle.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PICKAXE)
  @>Text: \xn[Crook B] You got a nice pickaxe there, you mind digging out the hole so we can get back to the boss?
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:RUSTEDPICKAXE)
   @>Text: \xn[Crook B] If you could touch up that pickaxe, we would be able to immediately get back to the boss.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \xn[Crook B] We don't get any way back to the boss, but I bet that woman does have a way further inland.
   @>Control Switches: [0223: PiratesA] = ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Crook B] That Woman got you to come in here and deal with us, didn't she?
 @>Text: \xn[Crook B] We'll show yo-
 @>Set Move Route: [Red]
  :              : $>Graphic: "trchar000', 0, 4, 0
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: [Blue]
  :              : $>Graphic: "trchar071', 0, 6, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: [Blue]
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Your gonna show ALL of us, right?
 @>Text: \xn[Crook A] Ye-yeah!
 @>Script: pbRegisterPartner(:POKEMONTRAINER_Blue,"Blue",0)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDoubleTrainerBattle(:PIRATEGRUNT,"Grunt",0,nil,:PIRATEGRUNTB,"Grunt")
  @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>Text: \xn[Crook A] Curses! The boss is gonna be pissed.
  @>Text: \xn[Crook B] ...
  @>Text: \xn[Red] You both leave before I deal with you myself.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: (None)
  @>Set Move Route: [EV003]
   :              : $>Graphic: (None)
  @>Wait: 5 frame(s)
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Text: \xn[Blue] Well that's it then.
  @>Text: \xn[Blue] Lets head back.
  @>Control Switches: [0224: BeatGrunts] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Tileset: 001: Outside
Width: 20, Height: 15

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 225
Map Name: Johto Region
Tileset: 003: Inside
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (019,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This room is for soft resets. If your pokemon has 
 :    : unideal IVs, reset, if they are fine, click the Pokeball 
 :    : to save and continue.
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (019,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Save?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: EV003
(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: Save for resets?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: GameData::Species.exists?(pbGet(3))
 @>Script: pkmn = pbGet(3)
 :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,5)
 :       : $game_variables[3]=0
 @>Text: You can now open the menu to check IVs.
 @>Text: If you move, it will continue the game.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (009,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing
@>Label: SKIPPED
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 005
Event Name: EV005
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing
@>Label: SKIPPED
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing
@>Label: SKIPPED
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (019,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Save?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: EV003
(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: Save for resets?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: GameData::Species.exists?(pbGet(3))
 @>Script: pkmn = pbGet(3)
 :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,5)
 :       : $game_variables[3]=0
 @>Text: You can now open the menu to check IVs.
 @>Text: If you move, it will continue the game.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (009,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing
@>Label: SKIPPED
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>

Event ID: 005

(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Save?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: EV003
(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: Save for resets?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSave
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: GameData::Species.exists?(pbGet(3))
 @>Script: pkmn = pbGet(3)
 :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn,5)
 :       : $game_variables[3]=0
 @>Text: You can now open the menu to check IVs.
 @>Text: If you move, it will continue the game.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (009,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Login
@>Text: To complete the process, please type your Employee ID and Password.
@>Show Choices: Type in your password., Type random numbers., I dun wanna.
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Type in your password.]
 @>Text: Logging in \PN, Employee ID #28477.
 @>
: When [Type random numbers.]
 @>Text: Incorrect password.
 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: ...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Transfer Player:[003: S.S. Glittering], (009,009), Up
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Exit Event Processing
@>Label: SKIPPED
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>

: When [Type in your password.]

 @>Jump to Label: Login
 @>
: When [I dun wanna.]
 @>Game Over
 @>

@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 0
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin0', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 1
  @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin1', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 2
   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>

    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.

@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3

@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1

: When [No]

 : Else

     @>

 : Else

 : Else

   @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin2', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 3
    @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin3', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 4
     @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin4', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 5
      @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin5', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
      @>
     : Else
      @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: CharacterSkin] == 6
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin6', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Else
       @>Show Picture: 3, 'charskin7', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Employee status: INTERN,
@>Text: Employee Age: 18\nSecurity Access: PRIORITY 
 :    : ACCESS - ALL
 :    : You are currently witnessing secure footage. 
@>Text: Anything that you may see we are not liable under 
 :    : code 547 of the Kanto-Johto Accords.
@>Label: Initialize
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.

@>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
@>Control Switches: [0143: I dunno what this is] = ON
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:POTION,3)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)

@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: [\wm]Thank you for to playing my game.
@>Text: [\wm]From this point out, you will be in the island one post game, and given a little bit more freedom to travel around the island.
@>Text: [\wm]If you haven't already, maybe look into completing all the Dungeons, of which, some more are going to be opening up.
@>Text: [\wm]As a gift for completing the game, you can choose a free POKeMON within the same limits as the beginning of the game.
@>Script: pbTextEntry("Enter a Pokemon name or Type.",0,10,3)
@>Script: pbSetUpcase(3)
@>Script: pbFixCommonStarterSpellingErrors(3)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !hasConst?(PBSpecies,pbGet(3))
 @>Text: That's not a Pokemon. Check your spelling!
 @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbLegendaryStarter?(3)
 @>Text: You cannot select a Legendary Pokemon. That would be a little overpowered, wouldn't it?
 @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPhioneStarter?(3)
 @>Text: Okay, look.
 @>Text: I know that Phione's status as a Legendary Pokemon 
  :    : is disputed.
 @>Text: But I'm still gonna say no.
 @>Text: Sorry :(
 @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbIsLowestEvolutionStarter?(3)
 @>Script: pbSetGameVariables(12,3)
 @>
: Else
 @>Script: pbSetBaseEvolutionStarter(15,3)
 @>Text: \v[3] is an evolved Pokemon.
 @>Text: Instead choose its lowest form, \v[15].
 @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Are you sure you want to select \v[12]?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbSetGameVariables(12,15)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Try again.
 @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbMagikarpStarter?(3)
 @>Text: Are you ABSOLUTELY POSITIVE you want to select 
  :    : \v[12]?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: ...
  @>Text: Really?
  @>Text: Don't say I didn't warn you.
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Try again.
  @>Jump to Label: pkmnselect
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: [\wm]You will now be returned to Reds House in a Post Game State.
@>Transfer Player:[162: Red's Cabin], (011,006)
@>

     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MACHOBRACE,1)

    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 0
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:OLDGATEAU,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 1
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:TM20,1)
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 2
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SWIFTWING,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 3
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:RESISTWING,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 4
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MOOMOOMILK,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 5
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POTION,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 6
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:LEFTOVERS,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 7
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POWERHERB,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 8
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:FOCUSSASH,1)
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 9
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SHELLBELL,1)
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 10
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:BLACKSLUDGE,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 11
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:IRON2,pbGet(239))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0240: TalkingPoints] == 12
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:BIGROOT,1)
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: You changed your mind.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: The Monkey seems offended that you do not have any Oran Berries.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

$>Turn Down

Move Animation

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0254: GoBeatUpSunWukong] == ON
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0262: BeattheKing] == OFF
  @>Text: \xn[Sun] Hi.
  @>Text: You both wait a few seconds in silence.
  @>Label: Start
  @>Text: \xn[Sun] Do you need anything?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: \xn[Sun] Then what?
   @>Show Choices: Whats with all the monkeys?, Whats with you?, Have you seen anyone else?, Stolen Items.
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Whats with all the monkeys?]
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] They live here, whats with you?
    @>Label: Live Here
    @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0253: SunEx] == ON
     @>Show Choices: Exploring., Finding Pokemon., Living My Life.
     (When Cancel: Branch)
     : When [Exploring.]
      @>Text: \xn[Sun] I explore a lot.
      @>Text: \xn[Sun] I wouldn't mind you exploring your way to upstairs and beating up a problem monkey for me.
      @>Control Switches: [0258: Atleastonemonkeygettinghisassbeat] = ON
      @>
     : When [Finding Pokemon.]
      @>Text: \xn[Sun] Whats a POKeMON?
      @>Show Choices: Explain what a POKeMON is., Point at Him.
      (When Cancel: Disallow)
      : When [Explain what a POKeMON is.]
       @>Text: It doesn't seem to sit with him all the way, but he seems to nod in understanding well enough.
       @>Text: After a minute though, he asks;
       @>Text: \xn[Sun] Are you a POKeMON?
       @>Show Choices: Say you are a Human., Say no., Have an existential crisis.
       (When Cancel: Disallow)
       : When [Say you are a Human.]
        @>Text: \xn[Sun] Whats a Human?
        @>Show Choices: Answer the best you can., Have an existential crisis., A Monkey.
        (When Cancel: Disallow)
        : When [Answer the best you can.]
         @>Text: He doesn't seem to get it, but goes with it.
         @>
        : When [Have an existential crisis.]
         @>Text: He seems to understand this very well.
         @>Text: He stares into your soul.
         @>
        : When [A Monkey.]
         @>Text: His mind looks blown.
         @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += 10
         @>Text: \xn[Sun] ...wait so if you are catching Monkeys, and you are a Monkey, are you commiting kidnapping?
         @>Show Choices: Facepalm, Just shrug
         (When Cancel: Disallow)
         : When [Facepalm]
          @>
         : When [Just shrug]
          @>
         : Branch End
         @>Text: He seems to get distracted pretty quick.
         @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
         @>
        : Branch End
        @>

        @>Text: He stares into your soul.
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>
      : When [Point at Him.]
       @>Text: He... he needs a minute.
       @>Label: Monkey

       @>Show Choices: Insist he is a POKeMON., Drop it.
       (When Cancel: Disallow)
       : When [Insist he is a POKeMON.]
        @>Jump to Label: Monkey
        @>
       : When [Drop it.]

       @>Text: His mind looks blown.

       @>Text: \xn[Sun] ...wait so if you are catching Monkeys, and you are a Monkey, are you commiting kidnapping?
       @>Show Choices: Facepalm, Just shrug
       (When Cancel: Disallow)
       : When [Facepalm]
        @>
       : When [Just shrug]
        @>
       : Branch End
       @>Text: He seems to get distracted pretty quick.
       @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [Say no.]
      @>Text: \xn[Sun] Then what are you?
      @>Text: He stares at you a good long second.
      @>Text: \xn[Sun] You look like a Monkey.
      @>
     : When [Have an existential crisis.]
      @>Text: He seems to understand this very well.
      @>Text: He stares into your soul.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : When [Point at Him.]
     @>Text: He... he needs a minute.
     @>Label: Monkey
     @>Text: \xn[Sun] but I am a monkey.
     @>Show Choices: Insist he is a POKeMON., Drop it.
     (When Cancel: Disallow)
     : When [Insist he is a POKeMON.]
      @>Jump to Label: Monkey
      @>
     : When [Drop it.]
      @>Text: You decide to drop it.
      @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Living My Life.]
    @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += 3
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] That's what I do!!!
    @>
   : When Cancel
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>Text: \xn[Sun] Fine, ignore my question.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else

  (When Cancel: Branch)

    @>Text: \xn[Sun] Dude, that was WEAK.
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] Get out of my house.
    @>Control Switches: [0256: BadatStaring] = ON
    @>Transfer Player:[283: Mountain Skies], (020,043), Down
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Call him out.]
   @>Text: \xn[Sun] And what are you gonna do about it?
   @>Show Choices: Fight you!, Ask if there are any chores., Nothing.
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Fight you!]
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] Fight me!?! The Great Monkey King?!? Sun Aipom.
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Disallow)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Text: \xn[Sun] Bet. Let's go.
     @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += 1
     @>Control Switches: [0257: FightingSunWukong] = ON
     @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>Text: \xn[Sun] Knew it.
     @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += -2
     @>Text: \xn[Sun] Too Bad I ain't gonna let you have a choice.
     @>Control Switches: [0257: FightingSunWukong] = ON
     @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Ask if there are any chores.]
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] There's always cleaning, oh but then you might take my stuff back to the Xatu... hmm.
    @>Text: He took a minute to think.
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] There's been a real problem monkey we had to put on top of the mountain.
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] Beat him up.
    @>Control Switches: [0258: Atleastonemonkeygettinghisassbeat] = ON
    @>Set Move Route: [Sun]
     :              : $>Turn Down
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Jump: +2,+0
     :              : $>Move Left
    @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
    @>
   : When [Nothing.]
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] ...
    @>Text: \xn[Sun] Doing nothing? Mad Flex.
    @>Set Move Route: [Sun]
     :              : $>Turn Down
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Down
     :              : $>Move Right
     :              : $>Jump: +2,+0
     :              : $>Move Left
    @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Say it checks.]
   @>Text: \xn[Sun] See, we are COMPLETELY above board here.
   @>Control Switches: [0255: Let him be.] = ON
   @>Set Move Route: [Sun]
    :              : $>Turn Down
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Down
    :              : $>Move Down
    :              : $>Move Down
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Jump: +2,+0
    :              : $>Move Left
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Show Choices: Introduce Yourself., Don't.
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Introduce Yourself.]
  @>Text: \xn[Sun] \PN? That's a weird name.
  @>Text: \xn[Sun] I'm Sun.
  @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += 1
  @>
 : When [Don't.]
  @>Text: He just squinted.
  @>Control Variables: [0242: SunLike] += -1
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Set Move Route: [Sun]
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Down

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (008,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: The Xatu takes notice of you immediately, wanting to know how you got up here.
@>Show Choices: Explain, Don't Explain
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Explain]
 @>Text: It seems surprised, but welcomes you nonetheless.
 @>Text: It seems to have something troubling it.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [Don't Explain]
 @>Text: Despite your lack of explaination, it still seems to glean how you did it.
 @>Text: It nods in recognition of you, before motioning to the exit.
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It is having trouble with a mischivous set of monkeys to the north, which are going around stealing from inhabitants of the island, and passerby boats.
@>Text: It is wondering if you could go trounce them for it.
@>Show Choices: Yes, Not right now., No.
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: It says it is to the north, on an island called Flower Fruit Island.
 @>Control Switches: [0254: GoBeatUpSunWukong] = ON
 @>Text: It gives you a Yellow Scarf for your troubles.
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:YELLOWSCARF)
 @>
: When [Not right now.]
 @>Text: It can understand your desire to explore.
 @>
: When [No.]
 @>Text: It dislikes your bluntness, and decides against the offer.
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Show Choices: I got him to stop.
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [I got him to stop.]
   @>Text: The Xatu nodded, and presented something to you.
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(PBItems::SHINYCHARM)
    @>Control Self Switch: C =ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else

 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Control Switches: [0249: ToldDyingSleep] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0205: Food] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0208: Sleep] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0206: Water] = 100
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isSpecies?(:MAGIKARP)
   @>Text: Here are the moves.
   @>Show Choices: Dragon Rage, Bubble, Reversal, Next
   (When Cancel: Branch)

    @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:DRAGONRAGE)
    @>

    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:BUBBLE)
    @>
   : When [Reversal]

    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:REVERSAL)
    @>

    (When Cancel: Branch)
    : When [Hydro Pump]
     @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:HYDROPUMP)
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : When Cancel
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When Cancel
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End

   @>Text: Here are the moves.
   @>Show Choices: Fly, Sing, Teeter Dance, Next
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)

    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:FLY)

    @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:SING)
    @>

    :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:TEETERDANCE)
    @>
   : When [Next]
    @>Show Choices: Refresh, Surf
    (When Cancel: Branch)

     @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:REFRESH)
     @>
    : When [Surf]

     :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:SURF)
     @>
    : When Cancel

    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End

    @>

   @>

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

  :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:AGILITY)
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End

: Branch End

 @>Text: Here are the moves.
 @>Show Choices: Agility, Refresh
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Agility]
  @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.add_first_move(:AGILITY)

(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbQuantity(:STARPIECE)>=3
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:STARPIECE,3)
   @>Text: It gives you a water.
   @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:FRESHWATER,3)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: You do not have enough.
  @>
 : Branch End

: When [No]
