None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Parallel Process

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:UPGRADEDCRAFTINGBENCH)
 @>Control Switches: [0402: UPGRADED] = ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:CAULDRON)
 @>Control Switches: [0147: CAULDRON] = ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:CRAFTINGBENCH)
 @>Control Switches: [0150: CRAFTING] = ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:APRICORNCRAFTING)
 @>Control Switches: [0144: POKEBALL] = ON
 @>
: Branch End

 @>Control Switches: [0406: PC] = ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:BEDROLL)
 @>Control Switches: [0407: BED] = ON
 @>
: Branch End

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 304
Map Name: Xatu Home
Tileset: 024: Temple
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (005,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.survivalmode == 0
 @>Text: The Xatu looks at you in your unkempt state from the crash.
 @>Text: It is willing to offer you some tips on survival.
 @>Text: \ch[249,-1,Pokemon,Pokeballs,Sleep,Water, Food, Health]
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == -1
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 0
  @>Text: Pokemon will be fine out in the wild like this, but in order to use more than the first six you catch, you will have to craft a Crate. Which is made of Iron and Wood in 
   :    : a Crafting Bench.
  @>Text: Upon crafting, all POKeMON beyond six you caught will be inside, until then, the Xatu will hold the others. There is a Xatu in another house that will trade for you, 
   :    : but it will cost Starpieces.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 1
  @>Text: If you want to make POKeBALLs, you will need Stone and Wood, and a Crafting Table.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 2
  @>Text: Your sleep, like all stats in Survival Mode will go down. It only goes back up when you sleep in a Bed or Bedroll. A Bedroll is made from Wool and Wood.
  @>Text: Sheep Pokemon hold Wool, so if you can catch some of those, you can make a bed. You could also send a POKeMON down to the dungeon to find items for you.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 3
  @>Text: Your water, like all stats in Survival Mode will go down. It only goes back up when you drink water through a Food Bag item.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 4
  @>Text: Your food, like all stats in Survival Mode will go down. It only goes back up when you eat food through a Food Bag item.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 5
  @>Text: Your Health goes down upon losing fights, or occasionally when running away. It also goes down when you are sleep deprived, starving, or water starved.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: The Xatu looks at you in your unkempt state from the crash.
 @>Text: It is willing to offer you some tips on survival.
 @>Show Choices: Bed, Storing Pokemon
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Bed]
  @>Text: A Bed will allow you to progress time so you can catch POKeMON available during certain times of day, or make berries grow faster.
  @>
 : When [Storing Pokemon]
  @>Text: Pokemon will be fine out in the wild like this, but in order to use more than the first six you catch, you will have to craft a Bench. Which requires Iron.
  @>Text: Upon crafting, all POKeMON beyond six you caught will be inside, until then, the Xatu will hold the others. There is a Xatu in another house that will trade for you, 
   :    : but it will cost Starpieces.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Text: It nods at you, and gestures to your bag. 
@>Text: If you can make it a Calm Mint at a Cauldron and give it to it, it would gave you a crate.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0492: Wenthere] == ON
 @>Text: It said you had already been in the house with a Cauldron.
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: It said to explore around, you would find the house with the Cauldron.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0403: FURNACE is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:FURNACE)
 @>Text: Place Furnace?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:FURNACE)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (008,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This Xatu greeted you with a nod.
@>Text: It prepared this place for you to stay until you can get a bed.
@>Text: Do you want to rest?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: How long?
 @>Text: How long would you like to sleep?
 @>Input Number: [0247: SLeepCounter], 1 digit(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == -1
  @>Text: You decide not to sleep.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 0
  @>Text: You decide not to sleep.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 1
  @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon for an hour.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
  @>Transfer Player:[305: Xatu Home], (011,007), Left
  @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
   @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 9600
   @>
  : Else
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 9600
   @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbSleepRestore
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 2
  @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon for 2 hours.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
  @>Transfer Player:[305: Xatu Home], (011,007), Left
  @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
   @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 19200
   @>
  : Else
   @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 19200
   @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] = 0
  @>Script: pbSleepRestore
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 3
  @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon for 3 hours.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Recover All: Entire Party

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 306
Map Name: Xatu Home
Tileset: 024: Temple
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (008,009)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: 178-xatu

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 0
@>Control Variables: [0003: Temp Pokemon Name] = 0
@>Control Variables: [0396: Floor] = 0
@>Text: This Xatu nodded at you.
@>Text: It tells you it is standing beside a Dungeon.
@>Label: Start
@>Text: Dungeons are areas on the island can only be entered by POKeMON.
@>Text: There are items that you can collect in the dungeon, and bring back up, but you are kicked back out upon death.
@>Text: While in the Dungeon, POKeMON will not gain levels, but if any POKeMON in the dungeon likes your POKeMON enough, it may come back up with your POKeMON.
@>Text: Do you understand?
@>Show Choices: No, Yes
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [No]
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Do you want to go into the Dungeon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0482: TwoMonsInDungeon] == ON
   @>Text: How many POKeMON do you want to take down?
   @>Show Choices: One, Two
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [One]
    @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
    @>Script: $game_variables[398] = $Trainer.party.length
    @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbSelectPokeTransform
    @>Text: It wishes you good luck.
    @>Wait: 1 frame(s)
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == -1
     @>Jump to Label: NO
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
     @>Script: $game_variables[402] = $Trainer.second_party.clone

Event Name: CAVEBASEMAKE
(X,Y): (009,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0148: Transfer2] == OFF
 @>Text: You get the idea you could mine a way between the 
  :    : two bases.
 @>Text: It would probably break your pickaxe though.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PICKAXE)
  @>Text: Start mining the tunnel?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:PICKAXE)
   @>Control Switches: [0148: Transfer2] = ON
   @>Play SE: 'Exit Door', 80, 100
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (255,255,255,255), @6
   @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
   @>Transfer Player:[010: Temperate Base], (012,013), No Fade
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON

: Else
 @>Text: You don't have a water bottle.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: Egg
(X,Y): (011,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: crate

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \bLooking over at your Pokemon, you are taken by surprise because there is an Egg.
 @>Text: \bDo you pick it up?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN picked up the Egg.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Show Choices: Abandon Egg, Wait
  (When Cancel: Choice 3)
  : When [Abandon Egg]
   @>Text: \bYou will not be able to take this egg if you abandon it. Are you sure?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: \bYou have abandoned the Egg.
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
    :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Wait]
   @>Show Choices: Daycare, Leave
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Daycare]
    @>Jump to Label: Daycare
    @>
   : When [Leave]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
 @>Label: Daycare
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==0
  @>Text: This is the Daycare Area.
  @>Text: You realize you could leave a Pokemon here, and it 
   :    : would be safe.
  @>Show Choices: Leave a Pokemon., Rather not.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Leave a Pokemon.]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: Which Pokémon do you leave here for now?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: You decide against it.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Label: RaiseAnother
   @>Text: You realize you could probably leave two.
   @>Show Choices: Might as well., Nah.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Might as well.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: Which Pokémon should you leave here?
    @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Text: Now they are having a playdate.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
    @>
   : When [Nah.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
     @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You decide against it.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Rather not.]
   @>Text: You decide against it.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Taking a look at your Pokemon...
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: TakeBack
   @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Label: TakeBackChosen
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
     @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
    :       : _I("Which one are you taking back?"),1)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1),3,4)
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rYou pick back up \v[3].
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
     @>Text: \rDo you take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Graphic: bed

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: When you lose a battle, your health starts to 
 :    : deteriorate.
@>Text: If you lose a battle while in critical condition, then you 
 :    : must restart from your last save.
@>Control Switches: [0249: ToldDyingSleep] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0205: Food] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0208: Sleep] = 100
@>Control Variables: [0206: Water] = 100
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Gold 75 or more
 @>Text: \PN woke up feeling well-rested.
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 50 or more
  @>Text: \PN woke up feeling rested, if a little achey.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 25 or more
   @>Text: \PN woke up feeling tired, but determined.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 24 or less
    @>Text: \PN woke up in pain, but shrugged it off. It can't be 
     :    : *that* bad...
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 033

(X,Y): (014,008)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0150: CRAFTING is ON

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:UPGRADEDCRAFTINGBENCH)
 @>Text: Place Upgraded Crafting Bench?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:UPGRADEDCRAFTINGBENCH)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:CRAFTINGBENCH)
  @>Text: Place Crate?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:CRAFTINGBENCH)
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 036
Event Name: EV036
(X,Y): (016,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This is debug rock.
@>Text: He is here to help if something isn't working.
@>Show Choices: No Follower, Start Items Missing, , Next
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [No Follower]
 @>Control Switches: [0149: Follower] = ON
 @>
: When [Start Items Missing]
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:CRAFTBOOK)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MAP)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PHONE)
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PLAYER)
 @>Text: a
 @>
: When []
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PLAYER)
 @>
: When [Next]
 @>Show Choices: Difficulty, Nuzlocke, Player, Next
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Difficulty]
  @>Text: \ch[204,-1, Easy,Normal,Hard]
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 0
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 0
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 1
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 1
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0204: DifficultySelect] == 2
   @>Control Variables: [0030: DifficultyLevel] = 2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Control Variables: [0031: DifficultyModifier] = 50
  @>
 : When [Nuzlocke]
  @>Show Choices: Normal, Softlocke, Nuzlocke
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Normal]
   @>Script: pbSetPermadeath(:NORMAL)
   @>
  : When [Softlocke]
   @>Script: pbSetPermadeath(:SOFT)
   @>
  : When [Nuzlocke]
   @>Script: pbSetPermadeath(:NUZLOCKE)
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Player]
  @>Show Choices: A, B, C, D
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [A]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
   @>
  : When [B]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(1)
   @>
  : When [C]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(2)
   @>
  : When [D]
   @>Script: pbChangePlayer(3)
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Next]
  @>Show Choices: Unlock Crafting Recipes., I need Mega Bracelet, Remove Stone Temple Rocks, Next
  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Unlock Crafting Recipes.]
   @>Script: setupCraftUnlocks
   @>
  : When [I need Mega Bracelet]
   @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MEGARING)
   @>
  : When [Remove Stone Temple Rocks]
   @>Control Switches: [0119: TEMPLEROCKS] = OFF
   @>
  : When [Next]
   @>Show Choices: Mamoswine party full, Remove Blue!, I have Waterfall, not  Dive!, Next
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Mamoswine party full]
    @>Show Choices: Yeah, I could., I could leave it sleeping too.
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yeah, I could.]
     @>Show Choices: POKeBALL, Great Ball, Ultraball, I don't have any.
     (When Cancel: Choice 4)
     : When [POKeBALL]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:POKEBALL)
       @>Set Move Route: Player
        :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:POKEBALL)
       @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
       :       : pkmn.form=1
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
       :       : pkmn.happiness=0
       :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
       @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
        :    : being caught.
       @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [Great Ball]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:GREATBALL)
       @>Set Move Route: Player
        :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:GREATBALL)
       @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
       :       : pkmn.form=1
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
       :       : pkmn.happiness=0
       :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
       @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
        :    : being caught.
       @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [Ultraball]
      @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:ULTRABALL)
       @>Set Move Route: Player
        :              : $>SE: '473Cry', 80, 100
       @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:ULTRABALL)
       @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:MAMOSWINE,10)
       :       : pkmn.form=1
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SKILLSWAP)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REST)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICESHARD)
       :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EARTHQUAKE)
       :       : pkmn.happiness=0
       :       : pbAddForeignPokemon(pkmn)
       @>Text: Before it went into the ball, it seemed unhappy about 
        :    : being caught.
       @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : When [I don't have any.]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : When [I could leave it sleeping too.]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Remove Blue!]
    @>Script: pbRemoveDependency2("Blue")
    @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
    @>
   : When [I have Waterfall, not  Dive!]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:HM05)
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:HM06)
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Next]
    @>Show Choices: I have a house!, Rock Gone, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 3)
    : When [I have a house!]
     @>Control Switches: [0132: HOUSE] = OFF
     @>
    : When [Rock Gone]
     @>Control Switches: [0206: Rock Gone] = ON
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When Cancel
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When Cancel
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: EV008
(X,Y): (038,036)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 3 or above

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:VOLTORB,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 7
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:VOLTORB,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 : Branch End

  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1

 : Branch End

   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:CHEWTLE,rand(3)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

 : Branch End

  @>

 @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
 @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0491: LeavingDungeon] = ON

@>Control Variables: [0396: Floor] = 0

   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON

   @>Script: pbSetEventTime

 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Event Location: This event,(010,012), Down
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 006
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (042,037)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 6 or above

Graphic: 208-steelix

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 2: Lower
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:STEELIX,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:STEELIX,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel)
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbSetEventTime
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled

:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:BALTOY,rand(3)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON

   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn

 @>

 : Branch End

Event ID: 016
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (040,037)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: TRAPINCH

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:TRAPINCH,rand(3)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 8
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:TRAPINCH,rand(3)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (047,043)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 2 or above

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Play SE: 'Exit Door', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
 @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
 @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0491: LeavingDungeon] = ON
@>Script: pbDetransform
@>Script: $Trainer.party=pbGet(398)
@>Control Variables: [0396: Floor] = 0
@>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (053,037)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: MORPEKO

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:MORPEKO,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 8
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:MORPEKO,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 : Branch End

(X,Y): (035,037)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: STANTLER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))

  @>
 : Branch End

 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 048
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (042,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: SNIVY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 7
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

Trigger: Action Button

Event ID: 049
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (043,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: FLOETTE

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:FLOETTE,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 10
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:FLOETTE,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[306: Xatu Home], (008,010), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:DUSTOX,rand(3)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))

 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime

  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

 : Branch End

Switch 0062: s:cooledDown?(1800) is ON
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Event Location: This event,(010,012), Down
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 009
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (036,036)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 6 or above

Graphic: ALAKAZAM

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 2: Lower
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:ALAKAZAM,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:ALAKAZAM,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbSetEventTime
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (037,036)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 2 or above

Graphic: KADABRA

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 2: Lower
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:KADABRA,rand(4)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:KADABRA,rand(4)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up

Event ID: 012
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (035,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: STANTLER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 020
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (039,037)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: APPLIN

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:APPLIN,rand(1)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 2
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:APPLIN,rand(1)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))

  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))

 : Branch End

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))

 : Branch End

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (047,043)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 2 or above

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Play SE: 'Exit Door', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
 @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
 @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Switches: [0491: LeavingDungeon] = ON
@>Script: pbDetransform
@>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
@>Control Variables: [0396: Floor] = 0
@>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

:       : setBattleRule("canLose")

 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 8
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON

  @>
 : Branch End

  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.

  (When Cancel: Disallow)

  @>

  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

 : Branch End

  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))

 : Branch End

 : Branch End

Event ID: 048
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (042,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: SNIVY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 7
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (050,043)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: FERROSEED

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:FERROSEED,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 8
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:FERROSEED,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Variables: [0425: MonsterHouse] += 1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Variables: [0425: MonsterHouse] += 1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 012
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (040,030)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: STANTLER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Variables: [0425: MonsterHouse] += 1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Variables: [0425: MonsterHouse] += 1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Text: Let it?

(X,Y): (037,036)

Page #1
Conditions
Variable 0396: Floor is 2 or above

Graphic: KADABRA

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 2: Lower
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:KADABRA,rand(4)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:KADABRA,rand(4)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

Page #3
Conditions
Switch 0062: s:cooledDown?(1800) is ON
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Event Location: This event,(010,012), Down
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 014
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (045,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: LEDIAN

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:LEDIAN,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 8
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:LEDIAN,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (035,037)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: STANTLER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 1: Slowest
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 1
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:STANTLER,rand(5)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 1
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 2
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 3
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 4
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(406))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 5
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(401))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(402))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(403))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(404))
  @>Script: pbAddPokemonSilent(pbGet(405))
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 048
Event Name: Trainer(1)
(X,Y): (042,036)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: SNIVY

Autonomous Movement
Type: Approach
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 4: High
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: setBattleRule("setStyle")
:       : setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbWildBattle(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) <= 7
  @>Text: The Pokemon seems to like you! It wants to join your party!
  @>Text: Let it?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:SNIVY,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0488: LeavingDungeonLoss] = ON
 @>Script: pbDetransform
 @>Call Common Event: CloneReturn
 @>Transfer Player:[036: Deep Swamp], (037,061), Up
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

   @>Control Switches: [0489: DungeonMons] = ON
   @>Script: pkmn = pbAddPokemon(:PERRSERKER,rand(2)+pbBalancedLevel($Trainer.party))
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: It seems disheartened but it is fine.
   @>Script: pbSetEventTime
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbSetEventTime
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0489: DungeonMons] == ON
  @>Text: Any Pokemon that have joined your party need to be put into the PC. Please do so.
  @>Script: pbPokeCenterPC
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
