Event ID: 015
Event Name: Egg
(X,Y): (007,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \bLooking over at your Pokemon, you are taken by surprise because there is an Egg.
 @>Text: \bDo you pick it up?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
   @>Text: \bYou have no room for it right now.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN picked up the Egg.
  @>Text: \bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Show Choices: Abandon Egg, Wait
  (When Cancel: Choice 3)
  : When [Abandon Egg]
   @>Text: \bYou will not be able to take this egg if you abandon it. Are you sure?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: \bYou have abandoned the Egg.
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg=0
    :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps=0
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Wait]
   @>Show Choices: Daycare, Leave
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Daycare]
    @>Jump to Label: Daycare
    @>
   : When [Leave]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
 @>Label: Daycare
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==0
  @>Text: This is the Daycare Area.
  @>Text: You realize you could leave a Pokemon here, and it 
   :    : would be safe.
  @>Show Choices: Leave a Pokemon., Rather not.
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Leave a Pokemon.]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: Which Pokémon do you leave here for now?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: You decide against it.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
     :    : That's unsafe.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Label: RaiseAnother
   @>Text: You realize you could probably leave two.
   @>Show Choices: Might as well., Nah.
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Might as well.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<=1
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: Which Pokémon should you leave here?
    @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Text: Now they are having a playdate.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
     @>Text: You realize you only have one pokemon with you. 
      :    : That's unsafe.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You leave your \v[3] for a while.
    @>
   : When [Nah.]
    @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
     @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: You decide against it.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Rather not.]
   @>Text: You decide against it.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Taking a look at your Pokemon...
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
   @>Text: \rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: TakeBack
   @>Text: \rDo you want your Pokémon back?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Label: TakeBackChosen
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
     @>Text: \rYour Pokémon team is full.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
    :       : _I("Which one are you taking back?"),1)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1),3,4)
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \G\rYou pick back up \v[3].
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited==1
     @>Text: \rDo you take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 017
Event Name: EV017
(X,Y): (009,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's a book on the moves a POKeMON can learn.
@>Text: Read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Do you want to teach one of your POKeMON a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: Which Pokémon needs tutoring?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
  :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
  :       :   }, true
  :       : )
  @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
   :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
    @>Text: You cannot teach Eggs.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?)
    @>Text: You cannot teach a Shadow Pokemon.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
    @>Text: It does not have a relearnable move.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: What move should be taught?
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 018
Event Name: EV018
(X,Y): (012,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's a book about cute POKeMON nicknames.
@>Text: Read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Do you want to change a POKeMONs Nickname?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon.  The index 
   :       : is stored in variable 1, the name in variable 3.
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
  @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
   :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: Check for eggs.
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
   @>Text: Eggs cannot be named.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
   @>Text: Shadow Pokemon are too rebellous to respond to a nickname.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($Trainer)
   @>Text: Only a monster would change another persons POKeMONs nickname.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: Are you sure?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: What is the new nickname?
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
   :       : pbSet(4, species)
   :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
   :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
    @>Comment: The Pokémon's nickname wasn't changed.
    @>Text: \bI see. You're right, there's no need to change this 
     :    : Pokémon's nickname.
    @>Text: \bIt already had a superb name!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == "" || pbGet(5) == pbGet(4)
     @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
     @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.name = nil
     :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
     @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
      :    : as \v[3]!
     @>Text: \bIt looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
      :    : vastly superior!
     @>Text: \bHow fortunate for you!
     @>
    : Else
     @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon whose party index is stored in 
      :       : Game Variable 1, and changes its name to the name 
      :       : stored in Game Variable 5.
     @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
     :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
     @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
      :    : as \v[5]!
     @>Text: \bIt is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
      :    : you!
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 019
Event Name: EV019
(X,Y): (015,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's a book about forgetting.
@>Text: Read it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Do you want to make a POKeMON forget a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
  @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
   :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
    @>Text: Eggs do not know moves.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: Shadow Pokemon are too anger filled to trust forgetting.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves==1
    @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
   @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1),2,4)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
     @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
     @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).forget_move_at_index(
     :       :    pbGet(2))
     @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
     @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: You can reduce your POKeMON's EV's down to zero.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: Which POKeMON?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
  @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
   :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).Egg?
    @>Text: Eggs do not have EVs.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: A Shadow Pokemon won't listen.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.ev[:HP] = 0
   :       : pkmn.ev[:ATTACK] = 0
   :       : pkmn.ev[:DEFENSE] = 0
   :       : pkmn.ev[:SPECIAL_ATTACK] = 0
   :       : pkmn.ev[:SPECIAL_DEFENSE] = 0
   :       : pkmn.ev[:SPEED] = 0
   @>Text: It is done.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 001
Common Event Name: Professor Oak phone

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: ......\wt[5] ......
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_map.map_id==27
 @>Text: Hello, \PN!\nI can see you calling me over there!
 @>Text: Come over and talk to me.
 @>Jump to Label: End call
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Hello, this is Professor Oak...\nOh, hello, \PN!
@>Text: So, how's your Pokédex coming along?
@>Show Choices: Evaluate Pokédex, Quit
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Evaluate Pokédex]
 @>Script: $game_variables[1]=
 :       : $Trainer.pokedexSeen
 :       : $game_variables[2]=
 :       : $Trainer.pokedexOwned
 @>Text: Hmm, let's see..\nYou've seen \v[1] Pokémon, and
  :    : \nyou've caught \v[2] Pokémon!\nI see!
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 30
  @>Text: Hmm, you still have a long journey ahead of you!
   :    : \nKeep on going!
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 75
   @>Text: Hmm, you're catching Pokémon at a decent pace!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 150
    @>Text: You've caught a lot of Pokémon, but make sure you're 
     :    : raising them carefully!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: I didn't even know that many Pokémon existed!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Quit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Show me your Pokédex again anytime!
@>Label: End call
@>Text: Click!\wt[10]\n......\wt[5] ......
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 002
Common Event Name: BlueFollow1

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Start
@>Text: \xn[Blue] Whatcha need?
@>Show Choices: Can you heal my Pokemon?, Escape Boat Crash., What Pokemon do you have, Leave me be.
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Can you heal my Pokemon?]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Yeah, lemme jus-
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Crap.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] I forgot my bag inside the cave I've been staying in.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Frakin entrance cave in.
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Escape Boat Crash.]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Oh? How did I escape the Boat Crash?
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Both Red and I have been around the Gym Circuit enough that we had Pokemon in the PC that knew Surf, so we used them to get out of there.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Current picked both of us up and split us up. Tossed me off my Blastoise, and I washed up Arceus knows where.
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] I'm surprised YOU managed to survive it though.
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0235: Told Him] == OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Show Choices: Tell him., Don't.
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Tell him.]
   @>Text: \xn[Blue] Just washed up? Wow.
   @>Text: \xn[Blue] That is really surprising, we barely had enough time to get our Mons before it sunk, much more anyone else get off, but you washing up like that gives me 
    :    : hope more people survived.
   @>Control Switches: [0235: Told Him] = ON
   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>
  : When [Don't.]
   @>Text: \xn[Blue] Secretive little bugger, aren't ya? Keep your secrets.
   @>Control Switches: [0234: Didn't tell him.] = ON
   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [What Pokemon do you have]
 @>Text: \xn[Blue] Oh, what mons do I get with me?
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0139: Blue] == ON
  @>Text: Well, my little Lillipup has grown into a Stoutland, it's level 37, knows Return, Superpower, Pursuit, and Facade.
  @>Text: My Eevee evolved into an Umbreon one night while I was fighting off some REALLY aggressive Staraptor. She's Level 41, and knows Wish, Protect, Toxic, and Foul 
   :    : Play, and I put a Leftovers on it.
  @>Text: I caught a Slowpoke, but now its a Slowbro. Level 39, knows Scald, Psyshock, Slackoff, Ice Beam.
  @>Text: Caught a Nidoran, grew it into a Nidoqueen, Level 40, knows Stealth Rock, Earthpower, Sludge Wave, Taunt.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Well, I got a Stoutland, it's level 37, knows Return, Superpower, Pursuit, and Facade.
  @>Text: Have an Umbreon, She's Level 41, and knows Wish, Protect, Toxic, and Foul 
   :    : Play, and I put a Leftovers on it.
  @>Text: I caught a Slowpoke, but now its a Slowbro. Level 39, knows Scald, Psyshock, Slackoff, Ice Beam.
  @>Text: Caught a Nidoran, grew it into a Nidoqueen, Level 40, knows Stealth Rock, Earthpower, Sludge Wave, Taunt.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Leave me be.]
 @>Script: pbRemoveDependency2("Blue")
 @>Script: pbRemoveDependency2("GaryEncounter")
 @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Common Event ID: 003
Common Event Name: Brendan dependent event

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bDo you want me to stop following you?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbRemoveDependency2("Brendan")
 @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
 @>Text: \bI'll stay here, then.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bLet's keep going!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Blue] Your loss if I beat it before you.
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 006
Common Event Name: Books

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Start
@>Text: There's quite a few guides on your Pokegear, which one do you want to read?
@>Text: \ch[246,-1,Flora Foundations,Crafting Conundrums,Poke Partners,Tubular Tools,Nature's Needs]
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0246: Books] == -1
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0246: Books] == 0
 @>Text: Flora Foundations: A guide to wild plants for 
  :    : estranged inventors.
 @>Text: Would you like to read this book?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Loop
   @>Text: Which chapter?
   @>Show Choices: Apricorns, Berry Basics, Mixing Berries, Other Ingredients
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Apricorns]
    @>Text: While berries dominate the varieties of floral life in the world, apricorns are some of the rarer plants. They have hard shells which may be difficult to open, but 
     :    : inside lies a variety of fragrances. 
    @>Text: The other main use for apricorns to store Pokemon. While this may seem bizarre at first, they can be carved, which allows them to capture Pokemon 
     :    : in different ways. The basic uses are to create Pokeballs, but there are other, more advanced capturing devices that can be created depending on the type of 
     :    : apricorn.
    @>Text: There is a special bench that can be used for creating Apricorns.
    @>
   : When [Berry Basics]
    @>Text: There are lots of types of berries...
    @>Text: They can be used for various crafting recipes, generally related to healing.
    @>Text: They can be given to a POKeMON to be held, of which the POKeMON will eat it on its own time, or crafted to make better healing items.
    @>
   : When [Mixing Berries]
    @>Text: Berries can be mixed in a simple cooking pot.
    @>
   : When [Other Ingredients]
    @>Text: Various item combinations can yield different results. Aside from berries, one can find various medicinal herbs in the wild that have unique effects on Pokemon. 
     :    : They can be used to create different types of vitamins and other medicinal drugs.
    @>
   : When Cancel
    @>Break Loop
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Repeat Above
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Common Event ID: 009
Common Event Name: Following

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: What do you want to do?
@>Show Choices: Talk to Follower., Send Follower off., Cancel.
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Talk to Follower.]
 @>Script: pbTalkToFollower
 @>
: When [Send Follower off.]
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0492: Wenthere] == OFF
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbExplorationState.partyCount==0
   @>Text: Do you want to send a Pokemon on an Expodition?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Label: Add PKMN
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemonCount<1
     @>Text: You only have one POKeMON.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Text: Which POKeMON do you want to send?
    @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] <= 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbExplorationDeposit(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: You send your /v[3] off for it's own adventure.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbExplorationStat.partyCount<9
     @>Text: Do you want to send off another POKeMON?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: Add PKMN
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Jump to Label: Choices
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: It would be unsafe to send out anymore POKeMON.
     @>Jump to Label: Choices
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Label: Choices
   @>Text: What do you want to do?\ch[1,4,Add POKeMON,Retrieve POKeMON,Receive Items,Send Off, Nevermind]
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
    @>Jump to Label: Add PKMN
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.partyCount>=6
     @>Text: Your team is full.
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbExplorationChoose(_I("Which one do you want?"),1,3)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] <= 0
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Script: pbExplorationWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: Your /v[3] comes back.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRecieveExplorationItems
     @>Text: You take back everything.
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: There is nothing.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Choices
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
    @>Text: Start the Expedition?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Disallow)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Script: pbExplorationItemPool([
     :       :  
     :       : :MEAT,:LEMON,:ACORN,:COCOABEANS,:SUGARCANE,:LEFTOVERS,:APPLE,:EGGEDIBLE,:CHERUBIBALL,:GOLDORE,:IRONORE,
     :       : :SILVERORE,:COPPERORE,:WOOL,:POKEBALL,:ZINC,:CARBOS,:CALCIUM,:HPUP,:IRON,:MOOMOOMILK,:FRESHWATER,:REVIVALHERB,
     :       : :MINDGEM,:NORMALGEM,:STEELGEM,:LIGHTBALL,:EVIOLITE,:DARKGEM,:DRAGONGEM,:GHOSTGEM,:ROCKGEM,:BUGGEM,:PSYCHICGEM,
     :       : :FLYINGGEM,:GROUNDGEM,:POISONGEM,:FIGHTINGGEM,:ICEGEM,:GRASSGEM,:ELECTRICGEM,:WATERGEM,:FIREGEM,:HARDSTONE,
     :       : :STONE,:CHARCOAL,:POWERWEIGHT,:POWERBRACER,:POWERBELT,:POWERLENS,:POWERBAND,:POWERANKLET,:QUICKCLAW,:SHELLBELL])
     @>Script: pbExplorationState.pbStart(10)
     @>Control Switches: [0492: Wenthere] = ON
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>Jump to Label: Choices
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 4
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbExplorationState.inProgress?
   @>Text: It seems one of your other POKeMON may be back soon.
   @>Control Switches: [0492: Wenthere] = OFF
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Your other POKeMON are on an expedition, give it time.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Cancel.]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 010
Common Event Name: Nuzlocke

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Are you sure you want to do a Nuzlocke?
@>Text: Once you have set these settings, they cannot be turned off.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuzlocke=true
 @>Label: NuzStart
 @>Show Choices: Connected Maps, Death Types, Revive Types, Finished
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Connected Maps]
  @>Text: Connected Maps means you can only catch 1 Pokemon in Each Map.
  @>Text: Activate?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Control Switches: [0281: MapTypeSet] = ON
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuzlockeMaps=true
   @>Label: ConnectedMaps
   @>Text: Connected Maps has some suboptions.
   @>Show Choices: Dupes Clause, Shiny Catch Clause, Cancel
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Dupes Clause]
    @>Text: Dupes Clause means you can catch a second Pokemon in a Route if your first a Duplication of one you have.
    @>Text: Activate?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Disallow)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.dubiousclause=true
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Shiny Catch Clause]
    @>Text: Shiny Catch Clause means you can always catch Shinies.
    @>Text: Activate?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Disallow)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.shinycatchclause=true
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Cancel]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Control Switches: [0281: MapTypeSet] = ON
   @>Jump to Label: NuzStart
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Death Types]
  @>Label: DeathTypes
  @>Text: Only choose ONE death type.
  @>Show Choices: Permadeath, PC Death, Player Controlled Death, Cancel
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Permadeath]
   @>Text: Permadeath means upon Pokemon Death, the System deletes the Pokemon.
   @>Text: Activate?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.permadeath=true
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuzsoft=false
    @>Control Switches: [0282: DeathTypeSet] = ON
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [PC Death]
   @>Text: PC Death means upon Pokemon Death, the System puts the Pokemon in the PC.
   @>Text: Activate?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuzsoft=true
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.permadeath=false
    @>Control Switches: [0282: DeathTypeSet] = ON
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Player Controlled Death]
   @>Text: Player Controlled Death means all Nuzlocke Death Functions are Manual by the Player.
   @>Text: Activate?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Switches: [0282: DeathTypeSet] = ON
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Cancel]
   @>Jump to Label: NuzStart
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Revive Types]
  @>Label: ReviveTypes
  @>Show Choices: No Revives, No Centers, Neither, Cancel
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [No Revives]
   @>Text: No Revives means you cannot revive Pokemon using Revival Items.
   @>Text: Activate?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Switches: [0283: HealingType] = ON
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuznorevives=true
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReviveTypes
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No Centers]
   @>Text: No Revives means you cannot revive Pokemon using Pokemon Centers.
   @>Text: Activate?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Switches: [0283: HealingType] = ON
    @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nuznocenters=true
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: ReviveTypes
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Neither]
   @>Control Switches: [0283: HealingType] = ON
   @>Jump to Label: ReviveTypes
   @>
  : When [Cancel]
   @>Jump to Label: NuzStart
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Finished]
  @>Script: Achievements.incrementProgress("NUZLOCKED",1)
  @>Play ME: 'GUI save game', 75, 100
  @>Text: Nuzlocke set up finished!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0154: MadeBase] == ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: It's late, you should head to bed.
 @>Text: You lay down on the cold hard ground to rest.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
  @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 28800
  @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Common Event ID: 012
Common Event Name: 

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0249: BedStorage] == 0
 @>Text: Would you like to rest and heal your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: How long would you like to sleep?
  @>Input Number: [0247: SLeepCounter], 1 digit(s)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == -1
   @>Text: You decide not to sleep.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 0
   @>Text: You decide not to sleep.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 1
   @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon for an hour.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
    @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 9600
    @>
   : Else
    @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 9600
    @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
    @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbSleepRestore
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0247: SLeepCounter] == 2
   @>Text: You lay down to rest with your Pokemon for 2 hours.
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0043: Reserved - Pokemon Count] = 0
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Control Switches: [0003: Choosing starter] = ON
    @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 19200
    @>
   : Else
    @>Control Variables: [0029: TimeDilation] += 19200
    @>Text: Your Pokémon were restored to full health.
    @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
    @>
   : Branch End

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 013
Common Event Name: PCCrate

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Show Choices: Use PKMN Storage, Pick Up, Cancel
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Use PKMN Storage]
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = 0
 @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip tile', 80, 100
 @>Script: pbStoragePC
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: When [Pick Up]
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up the Crate?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:PORTABLEPC)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : Branch End

 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.remove_pokemon_at_index(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: You cut up your POKeMON for food.
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MEAT,(rand(6)))
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>Text: You do not have enough POKeMON to delete.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Pick Up]
 @>Text: Are you sure you want to pick up your Cauldron?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:CAULDRON)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>

: When [Craft]

 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0203: CraftingStorage] == 0
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0498: HouseDownstairs] == ON
   @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0409] == ON
    @>Show Choices: Basic, Advanced, Powered
    (When Cancel: Branch)
    : When [Basic]
     @>Script: pbItemCrafter([
     :       : [:CRAFTINGBENCH,[:WOODENPLANKS,5]],
     :       : [:APRICORNCRAFTING,[:WOODENPLANKS,6,:STONE,2]],

     @>

     @>Script: pbItemCrafter([
     :       : [:GRINDER,[:STONE,5,:IRON2,3]],
     :       : [:MEDICINEPOT,[:CLAY2,6,:CHARCOAL,3]],
     :       : [:PORTABLECAMP,[:WOOL,30,:WOODENPLANKS,20,:COPPER2,7]],

     :       : ])

     @>

    @>
   : Branch End

   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Basic]

    :       : [:CRAFTINGBENCH,[:WOODENPLANKS,5]],
    :       : [:APRICORNCRAFTING,[:WOODENPLANKS,6,:STONE,2]],
    :       : [:FURNACE,[:STONE,6]],
    :       : [:CAULDRON,[:IRON2,6]],

    :       : ])
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : When [Advanced]

    :       : [:GRINDER,[:STONE,5,:IRON2,3]],

   : When Cancel
    @>

   @>

   @>Show Choices: Basic, Advanced
   (When Cancel: Branch)
   : When [Basic]
    @>Script: pbItemCrafter([
    :       : [:CRAFTINGBENCH,[:WOODENPLANKS,5]],

   @>

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0203: CraftingStorage] == 1

  :       : [:IRONDUST,[:IRONORE,0.25]],

 : When [Item]

  (When Cancel: Branch)
  : When [Page 1]
   @>Script: pbItemCrafter([
   :       : [:IRONDUST,[:IRONBALL,0.30]],

@>Script: $game_variables[398] = $Trainer.party.length

@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(1) == 0
 @>Script: $game_variables[402] = $Trainer.second_party.clone

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 049
Common Event Name: Two

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Text: Choose party leader.
@>Script: $game_variables[398] = $Trainer.party.length
@>Script: pbSelectPokeTransform
@>Text: Choose support.
@>Script: pbChoosePokemon(7,12)
@>Text: It wishes you good luck.
@>Wait: 1 frame(s)
@>Control Switches: [0480: Two] = ON
